+=============================================+

                    		
                  

                  

                    546
                    
                    
                      
")

                    		
                  

                  

                    547
                    5x
                    
                      
  invisible(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    548
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    549
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    550
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    551
                    
                    
                      
# SECTION 3: AUTOMATED DEPENDENCY SCANNING

                    		
                  

                  

                    552
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    553
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    554
                    
                    
                      
#' Check Package Dependencies

                    		
                  

                  

                    555
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    556
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    557
                    
                    
                      
#' Scans and validates all package dependencies, reporting any issues.

                    		
                  

                  

                    558
                    
                    
                      
#' Useful for diagnosing installation problems.

                    		
                  

                  

                    559
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    560
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fix Logical. If TRUE, attempt to install missing packages. Default: FALSE.

                    		
                  

                  

                    561
                    
                    
                      
#' @param verbose Logical. If TRUE, show detailed output. Default: TRUE.

                    		
                  

                  

                    562
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    563
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with:

                    		
                  

                  

                    564
                    
                    
                      
#'   - ok: Logical. TRUE if all dependencies are satisfied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    565
                    
                    
                      
#'   - missing: Character vector of missing packages.

                    		
                  

                  

                    566
                    
                    
                      
#'   - outdated: Character vector of outdated packages.

                    		
                  

                  

                    567
                    
                    
                      
#'   - details: Data frame with full dependency information.

                    		
                  

                  

                    568
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    569
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    570
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    571
                    
                    
                      
#' autograder_check_dependencies()

                    		
                  

                  

                    572
                    
                    
                      
#' autograder_check_dependencies(fix = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    573
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    574
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    575
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    576
                    
                    
                      
autograder_check_dependencies <- function(fix = FALSE, verbose = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    577
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    578
                    
                    
                      
  # Get package dependencies from DESCRIPTION

                    		
                  

                  

                    579
                    10x
                    
                      
  deps <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    580
                    10x
                    
                      
    required = c("Rcpp", "curl", "parallel", "memoise", "digest"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    581
                    10x
                    
                      
    suggested = c("testthat", "covr", "knitr", "rmarkdown", "openxlsx")

                    		
                  

                  

                    582
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    583
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    584
                    10x
                    
                      
  results <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    585
                    10x
                    
                      
    ok = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    586
                    10x
                    
                      
    missing = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    587
                    10x
                    
                      
    outdated = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    588
                    10x
                    
                      
    details = data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    589
                    10x
                    
                      
      package = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    590
                    10x
                    
                      
      required = logical(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    591
                    10x
                    
                      
      installed = logical(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    592
                    10x
                    
                      
      version = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    593
                    10x
                    
                      
      status = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    594
                    10x
                    
                      
      stringsAsFactors = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    595
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    596
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    597
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    598
                    10x
                    
                      
  all_deps <- c(deps$required, deps$suggested)

                    		
                  

                  

                    599
                    10x
                    
                      
  required_flags <- c(rep(TRUE, length(deps$required)), 

                    		
                  

                  

                    600
                    10x
                    
                      
                      rep(FALSE, length(deps$suggested)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    601
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    602
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (verbose) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    603
                    4x
                    
                      
    cat("\n=== Autograder Dependency Check ===\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    604
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    605
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    606
                    10x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(all_deps)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    607
                    100x
                    
                      
    pkg <- all_deps[i]

                    		
                  

                  

                    608
                    100x
                    
                      
    is_required <- required_flags[i]

                    		
                  

                  

                    609
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    610
                    100x
                    
                      
    installed <- requireNamespace(pkg, quietly = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    611
                    100x
                    
                      
    version <- if (installed) as.character(utils::packageVersion(pkg)) else NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    612
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    613
                    100x
                    
                      
    if (installed) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    614
                    100x
                    
                      
      status <- "OK"

                    		
                  

                  

                    615
                    !
                    
                      
    } else if (is_required) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    616
                    !
                    
                      
      status <- "MISSING (required)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    617
                    !
                    
                      
      results$ok <- FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    618
                    !
                    
                      
      results$missing <- c(results$missing, pkg)

                    		
                  

                  

                    619
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    620
                    !
                    
                      
      status <- "MISSING (optional)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    621
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    622
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    623
                    100x
                    
                      
    results$details <- rbind(results$details, data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    624
                    100x
                    
                      
      package = pkg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    625
                    100x
                    
                      
      required = is_required,

                    		
                  

                  

                    626
                    100x
                    
                      
      installed = installed,

                    		
                  

                  

                    627
                    100x
                    
                      
      version = if (is.na(version)) "" else version,

                    		
                  

                  

                    628
                    100x
                    
                      
      status = status,

                    		
                  

                  

                    629
                    100x
                    
                      
      stringsAsFactors = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    630
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    631
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    632
                    100x
                    
                      
    if (verbose) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    633
                    40x
                    
                      
      icon <- if (installed) "\u2714" else if (is_required) "\u2718" else "-"

                    		
                  

                  

                    634
                    40x
                    
                      
      cat(sprintf("  [%s] %-12s %s\n", icon, pkg, status))

                    		
                  

                  

                    635
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    636
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    637
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    638
                    
                    
                      
  # Check R version

                    		
                  

                  

                    639
                    10x
                    
                      
  r_version <- getRversion()

                    		
                  

                  

                    640
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (verbose) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    641
                    4x
                    
                      
    cat(sprintf("\n  R version: %s\n", r_version))

                    		
                  

                  

                    642
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    643
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    644
                    
                    
                      
  # Check C++ compiler (for Rcpp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    645
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (verbose) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    646
                    4x
                    
                      
    has_compiler <- tryCatch({

                    		
                  

                  

                    647
                    
                    
                      
      # Check if Rtools or compiler is available

                    		
                  

                  

                    648
                    4x
                    
                      
      system("where g++", ignore.stdout = TRUE, ignore.stderr = TRUE) == 0 ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    649
                    4x
                    
                      
        system("where cl", ignore.stdout = TRUE, ignore.stderr = TRUE) == 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    650
                    4x
                    
                      
    }, error = function(e) FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    651
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    652
                    4x
                    
                      
    compiler_status <- if (has_compiler) "OK" else "NOT FOUND"

                    		
                  

                  

                    653
                    4x
                    
                      
    cat(sprintf("  C++ compiler: %s\n", compiler_status))

                    		
                  

                  

                    654
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    655
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    656
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (verbose) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    657
                    4x
                    
                      
    cat("\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    658
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (results$ok) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    659
                    4x
                    
                      
      cat("\u2714 All required dependencies are installed.\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    660
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    661
                    !
                    
                      
      cat("\u2718 Missing required packages:", paste(results$missing, collapse = ", "), "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    662
                    !
                    
                      
      cat("\nTo install missing packages:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    663
                    !
                    
                      
      cat(sprintf("  install.packages(c('%s'))\n\n", 

                    		
                  

                  

                    664
                    !
                    
                      
                  paste(results$missing, collapse = "', '")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    665
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    666
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    667
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    668
                    
                    
                      
  # Attempt to fix if requested

                    		
                  

                  

                    669
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (fix && length(results$missing) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    670
                    !
                    
                      
    if (verbose) cat("Attempting to install missing packages...\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    671
                    !
                    
                      
    for (pkg in results$missing) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    672
                    !
                    
                      
      tryCatch({

                    		
                  

                  

                    673
                    !
                    
                      
        utils::install.packages(pkg, quiet = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    674
                    !
                    
                      
        if (verbose) cat(sprintf("  Installed: %s\n", pkg))

                    		
                  

                  

                    675
                    !
                    
                      
      }, error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    676
                    !
                    
                      
        if (verbose) cat(sprintf("  Failed to install: %s - %s\n", pkg, e$message))

                    		
                  

                  

                    677
                    
                    
                      
      })

                    		
                  

                  

                    678
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    679
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    680
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    681
                    10x
                    
                      
  invisible(results)

                    		
                  

                  

                    682
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    683
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    684
                    
                    
                      
#' Diagnose Common Issues

                    		
                  

                  

                    685
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    686
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    687
                    
                    
                      
#' Runs a comprehensive diagnostic check to identify common issues with

                    		
                  

                  

                    688
                    
                    
                      
#' the autograder setup.

                    		
                  

                  

                    689
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    690
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with diagnostic results.

                    		
                  

                  

                    691
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    692
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    693
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    694
                    
                    
                      
#' autograder_diagnose()

                    		
                  

                  

                    695
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    696
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    697
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    698
                    
                    
                      
autograder_diagnose <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    699
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    700
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("========================================\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    701
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("  AUTOGRADER DIAGNOSTIC REPORT\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    702
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("========================================\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    703
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    704
                    6x
                    
                      
  results <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    705
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    706
                    
                    
                      
  # 1. Check R version

                    		
                  

                  

                    707
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("1. R Environment\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    708
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat(sprintf("   R version: %s\n", getRversion()))

                    		
                  

                  

                    709
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat(sprintf("   Platform: %s\n", R.version$platform))

                    		
                  

                  

                    710
                    6x
                    
                      
  results$r_version <- getRversion()

                    		
                  

                  

                    711
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    712
                    
                    
                      
  # 2. Check package version

                    		
                  

                  

                    713
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("\n2. Autograder Package\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    714
                    6x
                    
                      
  version <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    715
                    6x
                    
                      
    as.character(utils::packageVersion("autograder")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    716
                    6x
                    
                      
    error = function(e) "NOT INSTALLED"

                    		
                  

                  

                    717
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    718
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat(sprintf("   Version: %s\n", version))

                    		
                  

                  

                    719
                    6x
                    
                      
  results$autograder_version <- version

                    		
                  

                  

                    720
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    721
                    
                    
                      
  # 3. Check dependencies

                    		
                  

                  

                    722
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("\n3. Dependencies\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    723
                    6x
                    
                      
  deps_result <- autograder_check_dependencies(verbose = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    724
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (deps_result$ok) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    725
                    6x
                    
                      
    cat("   All required dependencies: OK\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    726
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    727
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(sprintf("   Missing packages: %s\n", paste(deps_result$missing, collapse = ", ")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    728
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    729
                    6x
                    
                      
  results$dependencies <- deps_result

                    		
                  

                  

                    730
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    731
                    
                    
                      
  # 4. Check internet connection

                    		
                  

                  

                    732
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("\n4. Network\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    733
                    6x
                    
                      
  has_internet <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    734
                    6x
                    
                      
    curl::has_internet(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    735
                    6x
                    
                      
    error = function(e) FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    736
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    737
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat(sprintf("   Internet connection: %s\n", if (has_internet) "OK" else "NOT AVAILABLE"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    738
                    6x
                    
                      
  results$has_internet <- has_internet

                    		
                  

                  

                    739
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    740
                    
                    
                      
  # 5. Check repository access

                    		
                  

                  

                    741
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("\n5. Repository Access\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    742
                    6x
                    
                      
  repo_ok <- tryCatch({

                    		
                  

                  

                    743
                    6x
                    
                      
    .cpp_has_internet()

                    		
                  

                  

                    744
                    6x
                    
                      
  }, error = function(e) FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    745
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat(sprintf("   Repository reachable: %s\n", if (repo_ok) "OK" else "NOT AVAILABLE"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    746
                    6x
                    
                      
  results$repo_access <- repo_ok

                    		
                  

                  

                    747
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    748
                    
                    
                      
  # 6. Check cache status

                    		
                  

                  

                    749
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("\n6. Cache\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    750
                    6x
                    
                      
  cache <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    751
                    6x
                    
                      
    cache_info(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    752
                    6x
                    
                      
    error = function(e) list(instructor_cache_size = 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    753
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    754
                    6x
                    
                      
  cache_size <- if (!is.null(cache$instructor_cache_size)) cache$instructor_cache_size else 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    755
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat(sprintf("   Cache status: %d items cached\n", cache_size))

                    		
                  

                  

                    756
                    6x
                    
                      
  results$cache <- cache

                    		
                  

                  

                    757
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    758
                    
                    
                      
  # Summary

                    		
                  

                  

                    759
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("\n========================================\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    760
                    6x
                    
                      
  overall <- deps_result$ok && has_internet

                    		
                  

                  

                    761
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (overall) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    762
                    6x
                    
                      
    cat("  STATUS: All systems operational\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    763
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    764
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("  STATUS: Issues detected\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    765
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("\n  Recommended actions:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    766
                    !
                    
                      
    if (!deps_result$ok) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    767
                    !
                    
                      
      cat("    - Run: autograder_check_dependencies(fix = TRUE)\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    768
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    769
                    !
                    
                      
    if (!has_internet) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    770
                    !
                    
                      
      cat("    - Check your internet connection\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    771
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    772
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    773
                    6x
                    
                      
  cat("========================================\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    774
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    775
                    6x
                    
                      
  invisible(results)

                    		
                  

                  

                    776
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    777
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    778
                    
                    
                      
#' Check if a function is properly defined

                    		
                  

                  

                    779
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    780
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    781
                    
                    
                      
#' Validates that a student function is properly defined and ready for testing.

                    		
                  

                  

                    782
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    783
                    
                    
                      
#' @param problem_name Character. The problem name (e.g., "fibonacci").

                    		
                  

                  

                    784
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    785
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Logical. TRUE if the function is properly defined.

                    		
                  

                  

                    786
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    787
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    788
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    789
                    
                    
                      
#' student_fibonacci <- function(n) { ... }

                    		
                  

                  

                    790
                    
                    
                      
#' check_student_function("fibonacci")

                    		
                  

                  

                    791
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    792
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    793
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    794
                    
                    
                      
check_student_function <- function(problem_name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    795
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.character(problem_name) || length(problem_name) != 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    796
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("problem_name must be a single character string", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    797
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    798
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    799
                    !
                    
                      
  fn_name <- paste0("student_", problem_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    800
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    801
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(sprintf("\nChecking function: %s\n\n", fn_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    802
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    803
                    
                    
                      
  # Check if exists

                    		
                  

                  

                    804
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!exists(fn_name, envir = .GlobalEnv)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    805
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("\u2718 Function not found in global environment.\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    806
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("\n  Solution: Define your function first:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    807
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(sprintf("    %s <- function(...) {\n", fn_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    808
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("      # Your implementation\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    809
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("    }\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    810
                    !
                    
                      
    return(invisible(FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    811
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    812
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    813
                    !
                    
                      
  fn <- get(fn_name, envir = .GlobalEnv)

                    		
                  

                  

                    814
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    815
                    
                    
                      
  # Check if it's a function

                    		
                  

                  

                    816
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.function(fn)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    817
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(sprintf("\u2718 '%s' exists but is not a function.\n", fn_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    818
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(sprintf("   Current type: %s\n", typeof(fn)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    819
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("\n  Solution: Redefine as a function.\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    820
                    !
                    
                      
    return(invisible(FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    821
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    822
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    823
                    
                    
                      
  # Get function info

                    		
                  

                  

                    824
                    !
                    
                      
  args <- names(formals(fn))

                    		
                  

                  

                    825
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(sprintf("\u2714 Function found: %s\n", fn_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    826
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(sprintf("   Arguments: %s\n", 

                    		
                  

                  

                    827
                    !
                    
                      
              if (length(args) == 0) "(none)" else paste(args, collapse = ", ")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    828
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    829
                    
                    
                      
  # Quick syntax check

                    		
                  

                  

                    830
                    !
                    
                      
  cat("   Syntax: OK\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    831
                    !
                    
                      
  cat("\n\u2714 Ready to test with: autograder('", problem_name, "')\n\n", sep = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    832
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    833
                    !
                    
                      
  invisible(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    834
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
# AUTOGRADER PACKAGE - CUSTOM COMPARISON FUNCTIONS

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
# File: comparison.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
# Purpose: Registry and utilities for custom comparison functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
# This module provides:

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#   - A registry of reusable comparison functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#   - Built-in comparators for common data types

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#   - Tools for instructors to create custom comparators

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
# Author: Reijel Agub (rcagub@up.edu.ph)

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
# Version: 0.4.0

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
# License: MIT

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
# COMPARISON FUNCTION REGISTRY

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
# Private environment to store registered comparison functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
.comparison_registry <- new.env(parent = emptyenv())

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' Register a custom comparison function

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' Registers a named comparison function that can be used in test cases.

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' Comparison functions should take two arguments (student output, expected output)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' and return TRUE if they match, FALSE otherwise.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @param name Character. Unique name for the comparison function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fn Function. Comparison function taking (actual, expected) and returning logical.

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @param description Character. Optional description of what this comparator does.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Invisibly returns TRUE on success.

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' # Register a case-insensitive string comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' register_comparison("case_insensitive", function(actual, expected) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   tolower(actual) == tolower(expected)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' })

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' # Use in test cases

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' test_cases <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'   inputs = list(list("Hello")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   comparison_fn = get_comparison("case_insensitive")

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
register_comparison <- function(name, fn, description = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  # Validate inputs

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    21x
                    
                      
  if (!is.character(name) || length(name) != 1 || nchar(name) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    2x
                    
                      
    stop("'name' must be a non-empty character string", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    19x
                    
                      
  if (!is.function(fn)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
    stop("'fn' must be a function", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  # Check function signature (should accept at least 2 arguments)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    18x
                    
                      
  fn_args <- names(formals(fn))

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    18x
                    
                      
  if (length(fn_args) < 2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
    stop("Comparison function must accept at least 2 arguments (actual, expected)", 

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1x
                    
                      
         call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  # Store in registry

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    17x
                    
                      
  .comparison_registry[[name]] <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    17x
                    
                      
    fn = fn,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    17x
                    
                      
    description = description %||% ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    17x
                    
                      
  invisible(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' Get a registered comparison function

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieves a comparison function from the registry by name.

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' @param name Character. Name of the registered comparison function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The comparison function, or NULL if not found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' # Get the built-in numeric tolerance comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_fn <- get_comparison("numeric_tolerance")

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_fn(1.0000001, 1.0)  # TRUE (within default tolerance)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
get_comparison <- function(name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!exists(name, envir = .comparison_registry)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    9x
                    
                      
  .comparison_registry[[name]]$fn

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' List all registered comparison functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' Returns a data frame of all registered comparison functions with their

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' names and descriptions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Data frame with columns: name, description

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' list_comparisons()

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
list_comparisons <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    1x
                    
                      
  names <- ls(envir = .comparison_registry)

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (length(names) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
    return(data.frame(name = character(0), description = character(0)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    1x
                    
                      
  descriptions <- vapply(names, function(n) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    9x
                    
                      
    .comparison_registry[[n]]$description %||% ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    1x
                    
                      
  }, character(1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    1x
                    
                      
  data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    1x
                    
                      
    name = names,

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    1x
                    
                      
    description = descriptions,

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    1x
                    
                      
    stringsAsFactors = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#' Clear all registered comparison functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' Removes all registered comparison functions from the registry.

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' Built-in comparisons are re-registered after clearing.

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' @param keep_builtin Logical. If TRUE (default), re-register built-in comparisons.

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Invisibly returns TRUE.

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
