#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
clear_comparisons <- function(keep_builtin = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    2x
                    
                      
  rm(list = ls(envir = .comparison_registry), envir = .comparison_registry)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    2x
                    
                      
  if (keep_builtin) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    2x
                    
                      
    .register_builtin_comparisons()

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    2x
                    
                      
  invisible(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
# BUILT-IN COMPARISON FUNCTIONS

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#' Numeric comparison with tolerance

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#' Compares numeric values with a specified tolerance. Handles NA, NaN, Inf correctly.

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#' @param actual Numeric value or vector from student

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#' @param expected Numeric value or vector expected

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tolerance Numeric. Maximum allowed difference (default: package tolerance)

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Logical indicating if values are equal within tolerance.

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_numeric(1.0000001, 1.0)  # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_numeric(c(1, 2, 3), c(1, 2, 3))  # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_numeric(c(1, NA), c(1, NA))  # TRUE (NAs match)

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
compare_numeric <- function(actual, expected, tolerance = autograder_tolerance()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    8x
                    
                      
  .cpp_compare_fast(actual, expected, tolerance)

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' Exact comparison (strict equality)

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#' Compares values using R's identical() function. No tolerance for numeric values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#' @param actual Value from student

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#' @param expected Expected value

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Logical indicating if values are identical.

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_exact(1L, 1L)  # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_exact(1L, 1.0)  # FALSE (different types)

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
compare_exact <- function(actual, expected) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    4x
                    
                      
  identical(actual, expected)

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#' Case-insensitive string comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#' Compares character values ignoring case differences.

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#' Uses C++ implementation for better performance on large vectors.

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#' @param actual Character value from student

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#' @param expected Expected character value

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Logical indicating if strings match (case-insensitive).

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_case_insensitive("Hello", "HELLO")  # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_case_insensitive("abc", "ABC")  # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
compare_case_insensitive <- function(actual, expected) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    7x
                    
                      
  if (!is.character(actual) || !is.character(expected)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    2x
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    5x
                    
                      
  .cpp_compare_case_insensitive(actual, expected)

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
#' Unordered set comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
#' Compares two vectors as unordered sets (ignoring element order).

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
#' Uses C++ implementation for better performance with sorting and comparison.

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
#' Useful when the order of results doesn't matter.

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
#' @param actual Vector from student

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
#' @param expected Expected vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tolerance Numeric tolerance for numeric comparisons

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Logical indicating if sets contain same elements.

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_set(c(3, 1, 2), c(1, 2, 3))  # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_set(c("b", "a"), c("a", "b"))  # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      
compare_set <- function(actual, expected, tolerance = autograder_tolerance()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (length(actual) != length(expected)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
  # Use C++ implementation for sorting and comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    4x
                    
                      
  .cpp_compare_set(actual, expected, tolerance)

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
#' Data frame comparison (ignoring row order)

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
#' Compares data frames with tolerance for numeric columns.

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
#' Can optionally ignore row order.

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
#' @param actual Data frame from student

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
#' @param expected Expected data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tolerance Numeric tolerance for numeric columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ignore_row_order Logical. If TRUE, sort rows before comparison.

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Logical indicating if data frames are equivalent.

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
#' df1 <- data.frame(a = 1:3, b = c("x", "y", "z"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
#' df2 <- data.frame(a = 1:3, b = c("x", "y", "z"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_dataframe(df1, df2)  # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
compare_dataframe <- function(actual, expected, tolerance = autograder_tolerance(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
                               ignore_row_order = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
  # Check types

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (!is.data.frame(actual) || !is.data.frame(expected)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    !
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
  # Check column names (required before C++ call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (!identical(names(actual), names(expected))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    !
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      
  # Use optimized C++ implementation

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    6x
                    
                      
  .cpp_compare_dataframe(actual, expected, tolerance, ignore_row_order)

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
#' Length-only comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
#' Compares only the length/size of objects, not their content.

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
#' Useful for testing that functions return the correct number of elements.

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
#' @param actual Object from student

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
#' @param expected Expected object

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Logical indicating if lengths match.

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_length(1:10, 11:20)  # TRUE (both length 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_length(list(1, 2), c(1, 2))  # TRUE (both length 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
compare_length <- function(actual, expected) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    3x
                    
                      
  length(actual) == length(expected)

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
#' Class-only comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      
#' Compares only the class of objects, not their content.

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    
                    
                      
#' Useful for testing that functions return the correct type.

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    325

                    326
                    
                    
                      
#' @param expected Expected object

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Logical indicating if classes match.

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_class(data.frame(a = 1), data.frame(b = 2))  # TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_class(matrix(1), 1)  # FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    
                    
                      
compare_class <- function(actual, expected) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    3x
                    
                      
  identical(class(actual), class(expected))

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    
                    
                      
#' Approximate numeric comparison (relative tolerance)

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    
                    
                      
#' Compares numeric values using relative tolerance. Better for values

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    
                    
                      
#' spanning many orders of magnitude.

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    
                    
                      
#' @param actual Numeric value from student

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    
                    
                      
#' @param expected Expected numeric value

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rel_tolerance Relative tolerance (e.g., 0.01 for 1% difference)

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Logical indicating if values are within relative tolerance.

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_relative(1000, 1001, rel_tolerance = 0.01)  # TRUE (within 1%)

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    
                    
                      
#' compare_relative(1000, 1100, rel_tolerance = 0.01)  # FALSE (10% difference)

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    
                    
                      
compare_relative <- function(actual, expected, rel_tolerance = 0.01) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    7x
                    
                      
  if (!is.numeric(actual) || !is.numeric(expected)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (length(actual) != length(expected)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    
                    
                      
  # Use optimized C++ implementation with early termination

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    5x
                    
                      
  .cpp_compare_relative(actual, expected, rel_tolerance)

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    
                    
                      
# INTERNAL REGISTRATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    
                    
                      
#' Register built-in comparison functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    
                    
                      
.register_builtin_comparisons <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    2x
                    
                      
  register_comparison(

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    2x
                    
                      
    "numeric_tolerance", 

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    2x
                    
                      
    compare_numeric,

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    2x
                    
                      
    "Compare numeric values with absolute tolerance"

                    		
                  

                  

                    384
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    385
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    386
                    2x
                    
                      
  register_comparison(

                    		
                  

                  

                    387
                    2x
                    
                      
    "exact",

                    		
                  

                  

                    388
                    2x
                    
                      
    compare_exact,

                    		
                  

                  

                    389
                    2x
                    
                      
    "Strict identical() comparison"

                    		
                  

                  

                    390
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    391
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    392
                    2x
                    
                      
  register_comparison(

                    		
                  

                  

                    393
                    2x
                    
                      
    "case_insensitive",

                    		
                  

                  

                    394
                    2x
                    
                      
    compare_case_insensitive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    395
                    2x
                    
                      
    "Case-insensitive string comparison"

                    		
                  

                  

                    396
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    397
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    398
                    2x
                    
                      
  register_comparison(

                    		
                  

                  

                    399
                    2x
                    
                      
    "set",

                    		
                  

                  

                    400
                    2x
                    
                      
    compare_set,

                    		
                  

                  

                    401
                    2x
                    
                      
    "Unordered set comparison (ignores element order)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    402
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    403
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    404
                    2x
                    
                      
  register_comparison(

                    		
                  

                  

                    405
                    2x
                    
                      
    "dataframe",

                    		
                  

                  

                    406
                    2x
                    
                      
    compare_dataframe,

                    		
                  

                  

                    407
                    2x
                    
                      
    "Data frame comparison with numeric tolerance"

                    		
                  

                  

                    408
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    409
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    410
                    2x
                    
                      
  register_comparison(

                    		
                  

                  

                    411
                    2x
                    
                      
    "length",

                    		
                  

                  

                    412
                    2x
                    
                      
    compare_length,

                    		
                  

                  

                    413
                    2x
                    
                      
    "Compare only the length of objects"

                    		
                  

                  

                    414
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    415
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    416
                    2x
                    
                      
  register_comparison(

                    		
                  

                  

                    417
                    2x
                    
                      
    "class",

                    		
                  

                  

                    418
                    2x
                    
                      
    compare_class,

                    		
                  

                  

                    419
                    2x
                    
                      
    "Compare only the class of objects"

                    		
                  

                  

                    420
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    421
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    422
                    2x
                    
                      
  register_comparison(

                    		
                  

                  

                    423
                    2x
                    
                      
    "relative",

                    		
                  

                  

                    424
                    2x
                    
                      
    compare_relative,

                    		
                  

                  

                    425
                    2x
                    
                      
    "Relative tolerance comparison for numerics"

                    		
                  

                  

                    426
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    427
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
# AUTOGRADER PACKAGE - MEMOIZATION CACHING

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
# File: cache.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
# Purpose: Memoise-based caching for expensive operations

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
# This module provides:

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#   - Automatic caching of network requests

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#   - Time-based cache expiration

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#   - Manual cache clearing

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
# Author: Reijel Agub (rcagub@up.edu.ph)

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
# Version: 0.4.0

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
# License: MIT

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
# Private environment to store memoised functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
.memoise_cache <- new.env(parent = emptyenv())

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' Initialize memoise cache

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' Sets up memoised versions of expensive functions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' Called during package load.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
.init_memoise_cache <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
  # Get cache timeout from options (default: 1 hour)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    4x
                    
                      
  cache_timeout <- getOption("autograder.cache_timeout", default = 3600)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
  # Create a file-system cache for persistence across sessions

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    4x
                    
                      
  cache_dir <- file.path(tempdir(), "autograder_cache")

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (!dir.exists(cache_dir)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
    dir.create(cache_dir, recursive = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  # Memoise the problems list fetcher

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    4x
                    
                      
  .memoise_cache$fetch_problems <- memoise::memoise(

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    4x
                    
                      
    function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
      .cpp_fetch_problems_list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    4x
                    
                      
    cache = memoise::cache_filesystem(cache_dir),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    4x
                    
                      
    ~memoise::timeout(cache_timeout)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  # Memoise the data file fetcher

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    4x
                    
                      
  .memoise_cache$fetch_data_file <- memoise::memoise(

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    4x
                    
                      
    function(filename) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
      .cpp_fetch_data_file(filename)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    4x
                    
                      
    cache = memoise::cache_filesystem(cache_dir),

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    4x
                    
                      
    ~memoise::timeout(cache_timeout)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    4x
                    
                      
  invisible(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' Get memoised problems list fetcher

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
.get_memoised_fetch_problems <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (exists("fetch_problems", envir = .memoise_cache)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    8x
                    
                      
    return(.memoise_cache$fetch_problems)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  # Fallback to direct call if memoise not initialized

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
  .cpp_fetch_problems_list

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' Get memoised data file fetcher

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
.get_memoised_fetch_data <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (exists("fetch_data_file", envir = .memoise_cache)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(.memoise_cache$fetch_data_file)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  # Fallback to direct call if memoise not initialized

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
  .cpp_fetch_data_file

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' Clear all caches

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' Clears all cached data including:

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' - Memoised network results

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' - In-session instructor code cache

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' Use this when:

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' - Instructor updates test cases

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' - You want to force fresh data

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' - Debugging cache-related issues

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Invisibly returns TRUE on success.

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' # Clear all caches and refetch everything

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' clear_all_caches()

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' autograder("fibonacci")

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
clear_all_caches <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  # Clear instructor code cache

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    4x
                    
                      
  clear_instructor_cache()

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
  # Clear memoise caches

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (exists("fetch_problems", envir = .memoise_cache)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    4x
                    
                      
    memoise::forget(.memoise_cache$fetch_problems)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (exists("fetch_data_file", envir = .memoise_cache)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    4x
                    
                      
    memoise::forget(.memoise_cache$fetch_data_file)

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  # Clear filesystem cache

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    4x
                    
                      
  cache_dir <- file.path(tempdir(), "autograder_cache")

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (dir.exists(cache_dir)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    4x
                    
                      
    unlink(cache_dir, recursive = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    4x
                    
                      
    dir.create(cache_dir, recursive = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    4x
                    
                      
  message("All caches cleared.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    4x
                    
                      
  invisible(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' Get cache statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' Returns information about the current cache state.

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with cache statistics:

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' \itemize{

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item \code{instructor_cache_size}: Number of cached instructor environments

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item \code{cache_dir}: Path to filesystem cache

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item \code{cache_dir_size}: Size of cache directory in bytes

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item \code{timeout}: Cache timeout in seconds

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' cache_info()

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
cache_info <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    9x
                    
                      
  cache_dir <- file.path(tempdir(), "autograder_cache")

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
  # Calculate cache directory size

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    9x
                    
                      
  cache_size <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    9x
                    
                      
  if (dir.exists(cache_dir)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    9x
                    
                      
    files <- list.files(cache_dir, recursive = TRUE, full.names = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    9x
                    
                      
    cache_size <- sum(file.info(files)$size, na.rm = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    9x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    9x
                    
                      
    instructor_cache_size = length(ls(.instructor_cache)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    9x
                    
                      
    cache_dir = cache_dir,

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    9x
                    
                      
    cache_dir_size_bytes = cache_size,

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    9x
                    
                      
    cache_timeout_seconds = getOption("autograder.cache_timeout", 3600)

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#' Set cache timeout
