                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' format_output(1:1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' # "integer[1:1000] = 1, 2, 3 ... integer[1000] = 1000"

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' # Data frame - summary

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' format_output(mtcars)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' # "data.frame[32 x 11] columns: mpg, cyl, disp, hp, ..."

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' # Matrix - dimensions

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' format_output(matrix(1:100, 10, 10))

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' # "matrix[10x10]: 1 2 3 ..."

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
format_output <- function(obj, max_length = 200, preserve_structure = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
  # Handle NULL specially

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(obj)) return("NULL")

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== LISTS: Context-dependent formatting =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    154x
                    
                      
  if (is.list(obj) && preserve_structure) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    36x
                    
                      
    if (length(obj) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    7x
                    
                      
      return("list()")  # Empty list

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    29x
                    
                      
    if (length(obj) <= 3) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
      # Small lists: show full structure

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    23x
                    
                      
      output <- deparse(obj, width.cutoff = max_length)

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    23x
                    
                      
      output <- paste(output, collapse = " ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
      # Large lists: show summary with first 3 elements

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    6x
                    
                      
      output <- sprintf("list(length=%d, first 3: %s, ...)", 

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    6x
                    
                      
                       length(obj),

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    6x
                    
                      
                       paste(deparse(obj[1:3]), collapse = " "))

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== VECTORS: Length-dependent formatting =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    118x
                    
                      
  } else if (is.vector(obj) && length(obj) > 10) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
    # Long vectors: show head ... tail pattern

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
    # This gives context without overwhelming output

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    11x
                    
                      
    output <- sprintf("%s[1:%d] = %s ... %s[%d] = %s",

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    11x
                    
                      
                     class(obj)[1],          # Type (integer, numeric, character)

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    11x
                    
                      
                     length(obj),            # Total length

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    11x
                    
                      
                     paste(head(obj, 3), collapse = ", "),  # First 3 elements

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    11x
                    
                      
                     class(obj)[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    11x
                    
                      
                     length(obj),

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    11x
                    
                      
                     tail(obj, 1))           # Last element

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== MATRICES: Show dimensions and sample =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    107x
                    
                      
  } else if (is.matrix(obj)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
    # Extract first few elements from first column

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    11x
                    
                      
    sample_size <- min(3, nrow(obj))

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    11x
                    
                      
    sample <- as.vector(obj[1:sample_size, 1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    11x
                    
                      
    output <- sprintf("matrix[%dx%d]: %s ...",

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    11x
                    
                      
                     nrow(obj),

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    11x
                    
                      
                     ncol(obj),

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    11x
                    
                      
                     paste(sample, collapse = ", "))

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== DATA FRAMES: Show structure summary =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    96x
                    
                      
  } else if (is.data.frame(obj)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
    # Data frames are common in data analysis courses

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
    # Show dimensions and column names (most useful info)

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
    output <- sprintf("data.frame[%d x %d] columns: %s",

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
                     nrow(obj),

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    !
                    
                      
                     ncol(obj),

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
                     paste(names(obj), collapse = ", "))

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== DEFAULT: Use deparse =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
    # For other types (factors, dates, small vectors, etc.)

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
    # Use R's deparse which handles most types well

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    96x
                    
                      
    output <- paste(deparse(obj, width.cutoff = max_length), collapse = " ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== FINAL TRUNCATION: Ensure max_length is respected =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
  # Safety check: if output is still too long, truncate

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
  # This can happen with complex nested structures

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    147x
                    
                      
  if (nchar(output) > max_length) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    5x
                    
                      
    output <- paste0(substr(output, 1, max_length - 3), "...")

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    147x
                    
                      
  output

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
# AUTOGRADER PACKAGE - TEST CASE VALIDATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
# File: validation.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
# Purpose: Validate and normalize test case structures

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
# Note: Pure R implementation for maintainability. List operations are 

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
# R's native strength, so there's no performance benefit from C++ here.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' Validate and normalize test case structure

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' Performs comprehensive validation of test case data structure with

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' strict error checking. Ensures all test components are properly 

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' formatted and consistent.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' Required Fields:

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **inputs**: list of input argument lists (REQUIRED)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' Optional Fields (with defaults):

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **descriptions**: character vector of test descriptions

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **hidden**: logical vector indicating hidden tests

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **points**: numeric vector of point values per test

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **tolerance**: single numeric for floating-point comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **expected_type**: single character specifying expected output type

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **hints**: character vector of hints for failed tests

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **comparison_fn**: custom comparison function

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param test_data List containing test case configuration

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @param function_name Name of function (for error messages)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Validated and normalized test_data with all fields present

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' Validation Strategy:

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' **Critical Fields (STOP on error):**

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Missing inputs: Hard error (can't proceed)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Mismatched lengths: Hard error (data corruption)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Invalid types: Hard error (wrong configuration)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' **Optional Fields (WARN and fix):**

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Missing: Fill with defaults

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Wrong format: Warn and ignore

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Can proceed: Yes

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' Error Messages:

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Clear indication of what's wrong

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Tells user to contact instructor (config issue)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Never blames the student for instructor errors

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' # Valid test case

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' test_data <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   inputs = list(list(1), list(2)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'   descriptions = c("Test 1", "Test 2"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'   points = c(1, 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' validated <- validate_test_cases(test_data, "my_function")

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' # Missing optional fields - filled with defaults

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' test_data_minimal <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'   inputs = list(list(1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' validated <- validate_test_cases(test_data_minimal, "my_function")

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' # Returns: descriptions = "Test 1", hidden = FALSE, points = 1, tolerance = 1e-10

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
validate_test_cases <- function(test_data, function_name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== REQUIRED FIELD: inputs =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  # NULL is treated as missing, but empty list is a separate error

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    83x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(test_data$inputs) && !"inputs" %in% names(test_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    7x
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    7x
                    
                      
      sprintf("CRITICAL: Test cases for '%s' are missing required 'inputs' field.\nContact instructor to fix test configuration.", function_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    7x
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    76x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(test_data$inputs) || !is.list(test_data$inputs) || length(test_data$inputs) == 0L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    9x
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    9x
                    
                      
      sprintf("CRITICAL: Test cases for '%s' must have at least one test.\nContact instructor to fix test configuration.", function_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    9x
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    67x
                    
                      
  n_tests <- length(test_data$inputs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: descriptions =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    67x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(test_data$descriptions)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    13x
                    
                      
    if (is.character(test_data$descriptions)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    12x
                    
                      
      if (length(test_data$descriptions) != n_tests) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    6x
                    
                      
        stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    6x
                    
                      
          sprintf("CRITICAL: Test case descriptions length (%d) doesn't match inputs length (%d).\nContact instructor to fix test configuration.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    6x
                    
                      
                  length(test_data$descriptions), n_tests),

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    6x
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
    # Generate default descriptions

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    54x
                    
                      
    test_data$descriptions <- paste("Test", seq_len(n_tests))

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: hidden =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    61x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(test_data$hidden)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    7x
                    
                      
    if (is.logical(test_data$hidden)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    5x
                    
                      
      if (length(test_data$hidden) != n_tests) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    2x
                    
                      
        stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    2x
                    
                      
          sprintf("CRITICAL: 'hidden' field length (%d) doesn't match inputs length (%d).\nContact instructor.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    2x
                    
                      
                  length(test_data$hidden), n_tests),

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    2x
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    2x
                    
                      
      stop("CRITICAL: 'hidden' field must be logical (TRUE/FALSE). Contact instructor.", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
    # Default: all tests visible

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    54x
                    
                      
    test_data$hidden <- rep(FALSE, n_tests)

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: points =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    57x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(test_data$points)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    10x
                    
                      
    if (!is.numeric(test_data$points)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    3x
                    
                      
      stop("CRITICAL: 'points' must be non-negative numeric values. Contact instructor.", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    7x
                    
                      
    if (length(test_data$points) != n_tests) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    2x
                    
                      
      stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    2x
                    
                      
        sprintf("CRITICAL: 'points' field length (%d) doesn't match inputs length (%d).\nContact instructor.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    2x
                    
                      
                length(test_data$points), n_tests),

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    2x
                    
                      
        call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    5x
                    
                      
    if (any(test_data$points < 0)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    2x
                    
                      
      stop("CRITICAL: 'points' must be non-negative numeric values. Contact instructor.", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
    # Default: all tests worth 1 point

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    47x
                    
                      
    test_data$points <- rep(1, n_tests)

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: tolerance =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    50x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(test_data$tolerance)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    11x
                    
                      
    if (!is.numeric(test_data$tolerance) || length(test_data$tolerance) != 1L || test_data$tolerance < 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    6x
                    
                      
      stop("CRITICAL: 'tolerance' must be a single non-negative numeric value. Contact instructor.", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
    # Default tolerance

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    39x
                    
                      
    test_data$tolerance <- 1e-10

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: hints =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    44x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(test_data$hints)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    6x
                    
                      
    if (is.character(test_data$hints) && length(test_data$hints) != n_tests) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
      # Length mismatch - remove hints with warning

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    3x
                    
                      
      warning(sprintf("'hints' length (%d) doesn't match number of tests (%d). Ignoring hints.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    3x
                    
                      
                      length(test_data$hints), n_tests))

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    3x
                    
                      
      test_data$hints <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: expected_type =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    44x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(test_data$expected_type)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
    # Must be single character string

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    6x
                    
                      
    if (!is.character(test_data$expected_type) || length(test_data$expected_type) != 1L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    3x
                    
                      
      warning("Test case 'expected_type' must be a single character value. Ignoring.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    3x
                    
                      
      test_data$expected_type <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
  # ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: comparison_fn =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
  # Custom comparison for special cases (e.g., comparing plots, custom objects)

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    44x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(test_data$comparison_fn)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    6x
                    
                      
    if (!is.function(test_data$comparison_fn)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    3x
                    
                      
      warning("'comparison_fn' must be a function. Using default comparison.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    3x
                    
                      
      test_data$comparison_fn <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
  # Return validated and normalized test data

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    44x
                    
                      
  test_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#' Quick validation check for test case inputs (pure R)

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#' @param test_data List containing test case configuration

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' @return TRUE if basic structure is valid

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
quick_validate_inputs <- function(test_data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    4x
                    
                      
  !is.null(test_data$inputs) && 

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    4x
                    
                      
    is.list(test_data$inputs) && 

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    4x
                    
                      
    length(test_data$inputs) > 0L

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' Get test count from test data (pure R)

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#' @param test_data List containing test case configuration

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Number of tests, or -1L if invalid

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
get_test_count <- function(test_data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    3x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(test_data$inputs) || !is.list(test_data$inputs)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(-1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    2x
                    
                      
  length(test_data$inputs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#' Validate field lengths match test count (pure R)

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#' @param test_data List containing test case configuration

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n_tests Expected number of tests

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Named logical vector with validation results for each field

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
validate_field_lengths <- function(test_data, n_tests) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    2x
                    
                      
  c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    2x
                    
                      
    descriptions = is.null(test_data$descriptions) || length(test_data$descriptions) == n_tests,

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    2x
                    
                      
    hidden = is.null(test_data$hidden) || length(test_data$hidden) == n_tests,

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    2x
                    
                      
    points = is.null(test_data$points) || length(test_data$points) == n_tests,

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    2x
                    
                      
    hints = is.null(test_data$hints) || length(test_data$hints) == n_tests

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
# AUTOGRADER PACKAGE - DATA FILE LOADING

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
# File: data.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
# Purpose: Functions for loading and injecting external data files

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
# Functions:

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#   - fetch_data(): Download and load a data file from repository

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#   - prefetch_data_files(): Cache all data files before test execution

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#   - inject_data_into_inputs(): Replace file references with loaded data

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
# Supported Formats:

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#   - CSV: read.csv() -> data.frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#   - RDS: readRDS() -> any R object

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#   - RData/rda: load() -> environment objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#   - TXT: readLines() -> character vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#   - XLSX/XLS: readxl::read_excel() -> data.frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
# Security:

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#   - Filenames validated in C++ (no path traversal)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#   - Only allowed extensions processed

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#   - Temporary files cleaned up after loading

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
# ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetch a data file from the repository

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' Downloads a data file from the repository's data/ folder and

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' loads it into R.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' Supported Formats:

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **CSV**: Loaded with read.csv() into data.frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **RDS**: Loaded with readRDS() (any R object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **RData/rda**: Loaded with load() into environment

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **TXT**: Loaded with readLines() into character vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   - **XLSX/XLS**: Loaded with readxl::read_excel() into tibble/data.frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' Security:

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Filename validated in C++ (no path traversal)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Only allowed extensions: csv, rds, rda, RData, txt, xlsx, xls

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Downloaded to temporary file (cleaned up by R)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @param filename Name of the data file (e.g., "dataset.csv")

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The loaded data object (type depends on file format)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch a CSV file

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' df <- fetch_data("sample_data.csv")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch an RDS file

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' model <- fetch_data("trained_model.rds")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
fetch_data <- function(filename) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  # Input validation

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    9x
                    
                      
  if (missing(filename) || !is.character(filename) || length(filename) != 1 || nchar(filename) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    8x
                    
                      
    stop("filename must be a non-empty character string", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  # Use memoised fetcher for better performance

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
  fetch_fn <- .get_memoised_fetch_data()

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  # Call C++ to download the file (via memoised wrapper)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
  temp_path <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
    fetch_fn(filename),

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
      stop(sprintf("Failed to fetch data file '%s': %s", filename, e$message),

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
           call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  # Get file extension

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
  ext <- tolower(tools::file_ext(filename))

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  # Load based on extension

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
  result <- switch(ext,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
    "csv" = utils::read.csv(temp_path, stringsAsFactors = FALSE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
    "rds" = readRDS(temp_path),

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    "rdata" = , "rda" = {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      env <- new.env()

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      load(temp_path, envir = env)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
      # Return first object in environment

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
      objs <- ls(env)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
      if (length(objs) == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
        get(objs[1], envir = env)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
        # Return list of all objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
        mget(objs, envir = env)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
    "txt" = readLines(temp_path),

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
    "xlsx" = , "xls" = {

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
      # Check if readxl is available

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
      if (!requireNamespace("readxl", quietly = TRUE)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
        stop("Package 'readxl' is required to read Excel files. Install with: install.packages('readxl')",

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
             call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
      # Read Excel file and convert to data.frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
      as.data.frame(readxl::read_excel(temp_path))

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(sprintf("Unsupported data file format: %s", ext), call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
  # Clean up temp file

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
  unlink(temp_path)

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
  result

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' Prefetch and cache data files for test cases

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
