                    522
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    523
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    524
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Derive a key from multiple factors

                    		
                  

                  

                    525
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    526
                    
                    
                      
 * @param factors Character vector of key factors

                    		
                  

                  

                    527
                    
                    
                      
 * @param key_length Desired key length (default 32 for 256-bit)

                    		
                  

                  

                    528
                    
                    
                      
 * @return CharacterVector with hex-encoded derived key

                    		
                  

                  

                    529
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    530
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_derive_key")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    531
                    32x
                    
                      
CharacterVector cpp_derive_key(CharacterVector factors, int key_length = 32) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    532
                    
                    
                      
    try {

                    		
                  

                  

                    533
                    32x
                    
                      
        std::vector<std::string> factor_vec;

                    		
                  

                  

                    534
                    103x
                    
                      
        for (int i = 0; i < factors.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    535
                    71x
                    
                      
            factor_vec.push_back(as<std::string>(factors[i]));

                    		
                  

                  

                    536
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    537
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    538
                    
                    
                      
        std::string key = autograder::crypto::KeyDeriver::derive(

                    		
                  

                  

                    539
                    32x
                    
                      
            factor_vec, static_cast<size_t>(key_length));

                    		
                  

                  

                    540
                    32x
                    
                      
        std::string hex_key = autograder::crypto::Encoder::to_hex(key);

                    		
                  

                  

                    541
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    542
                    64x
                    
                      
        return CharacterVector::create(hex_key);

                    		
                  

                  

                    543
                    32x
                    
                      
    } catch (const std::exception& e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    544
                    
                    
                      
        stop("Key derivation failed: %s", e.what());

                    		
                  

                  

                    545
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    546
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    547
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    548
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    549
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Generate a random encryption key

                    		
                  

                  

                    550
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    551
                    
                    
                      
 * @param length Key length in bytes (default 32)

                    		
                  

                  

                    552
                    
                    
                      
 * @return CharacterVector with hex-encoded random key

                    		
                  

                  

                    553
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    554
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_generate_key")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    555
                    84x
                    
                      
CharacterVector cpp_generate_key(int length = 32) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    556
                    
                    
                      
    try {

                    		
                  

                  

                    557
                    
                    
                      
        std::string key = autograder::crypto::generate_random_key(

                    		
                  

                  

                    558
                    84x
                    
                      
            static_cast<size_t>(length));

                    		
                  

                  

                    559
                    84x
                    
                      
        std::string hex_key = autograder::crypto::Encoder::to_hex(key);

                    		
                  

                  

                    560
                    168x
                    
                      
        return CharacterVector::create(hex_key);

                    		
                  

                  

                    561
                    84x
                    
                      
    } catch (const std::exception& e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    562
                    
                    
                      
        stop("Key generation failed: %s", e.what());

                    		
                  

                  

                    563
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    564
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    565
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    566
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    567
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Encrypt a URL for storage

                    		
                  

                  

                    568
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    569
                    
                    
                      
 * @param url The URL to encrypt

                    		
                  

                  

                    570
                    
                    
                      
 * @return CharacterVector with encrypted URL

                    		
                  

                  

                    571
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    572
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_encrypt_url")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    573
                    7x
                    
                      
CharacterVector cpp_encrypt_url(const std::string& url) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    574
                    
                    
                      
    try {

                    		
                  

                  

                    575
                    7x
                    
                      
        autograder::crypto::UrlEncryptor enc;

                    		
                  

                  

                    576
                    7x
                    
                      
        std::string result = enc.encrypt_url(url);

                    		
                  

                  

                    577
                    14x
                    
                      
        return CharacterVector::create(result);

                    		
                  

                  

                    578
                    7x
                    
                      
    } catch (const std::exception& e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    579
                    
                    
                      
        stop("URL encryption failed: %s", e.what());

                    		
                  

                  

                    580
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    581
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    582
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    583
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    584
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Decrypt an encrypted URL

                    		
                  

                  

                    585
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    586
                    
                    
                      
 * @param encrypted_url The encrypted URL

                    		
                  

                  

                    587
                    
                    
                      
 * @return CharacterVector with decrypted URL

                    		
                  

                  

                    588
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    589
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_decrypt_url")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    590
                    6x
                    
                      
CharacterVector cpp_decrypt_url(const std::string& encrypted_url) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    591
                    
                    
                      
    try {

                    		
                  

                  

                    592
                    6x
                    
                      
        autograder::crypto::UrlEncryptor enc;

                    		
                  

                  

                    593
                    6x
                    
                      
        std::string result = enc.decrypt_url(encrypted_url);

                    		
                  

                  

                    594
                    12x
                    
                      
        return CharacterVector::create(result);

                    		
                  

                  

                    595
                    6x
                    
                      
    } catch (const std::exception& e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    596
                    
                    
                      
        stop("URL decryption failed: %s", e.what());

                    		
                  

                  

                    597
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    598
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    599
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    600
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    601
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Get the autograder version

                    		
                  

                  

                    602
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    603
                    
                    
                      
 * @return CharacterVector with version string

                    		
                  

                  

                    604
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    605
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_get_version")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    606
                    4x
                    
                      
CharacterVector cpp_get_version() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    607
                    4x
                    
                      
    return CharacterVector::create(autograder::get_version());

                    		
                  

                  

                    608
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    609
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    610
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    611
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Get R object type name

                    		
                  

                  

                    612
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    613
                    
                    
                      
 * @param obj R object

                    		
                  

                  

                    614
                    
                    
                      
 * @return CharacterVector with type name

                    		
                  

                  

                    615
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    616
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_get_type")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    617
                    58x
                    
                      
CharacterVector cpp_get_type(SEXP obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    618
                    58x
                    
                      
    return CharacterVector::create(autograder::compare::get_type_name(obj));

                    		
                  

                  

                    619
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    620
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    621
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    625
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    626
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Check if authentication is enabled

                    		
                  

                  

                    627
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    628
                    
                    
                      
 * @return LogicalVector TRUE if private repo mode enabled

                    		
                  

                  

                    629
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    630
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_is_auth_enabled")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    631
                    3x
                    
                      
LogicalVector cpp_is_auth_enabled() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    632
                    3x
                    
                      
    return LogicalVector::create(autograder::config::USE_AUTHENTICATION);

                    		
                  

                  

                    633
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    634
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    635
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    636
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Get authentication mode as string

                    		
                  

                  

                    637
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    638
                    
                    
                      
 * @return CharacterVector "secure" (only mode supported)

                    		
                  

                  

                    639
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    640
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_get_auth_mode")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    641
                    5x
                    
                      
CharacterVector cpp_get_auth_mode() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    642
                    5x
                    
                      
    return CharacterVector::create("secure");

                    		
                  

                  

                    643
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    644
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    645
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    646
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Check if authentication token is configured

                    		
                  

                  

                    647
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    648
                    
                    
                      
 * @return LogicalVector TRUE if token is present (not empty)

                    		
                  

                  

                    649
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    650
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_has_auth_token")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    651
                    2x
                    
                      
LogicalVector cpp_has_auth_token() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    652
                    
                    
                      
    return LogicalVector::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    653
                    2x
                    
                      
        autograder::config::USE_AUTHENTICATION && 

                    		
                  

                  

                    654
                    
                    
                      
        autograder::config::ENCRYPTED_TOKEN_LEN > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    655
                    
                    
                      
    );

                    		
                  

                  

                    656
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    657
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    658
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    659
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Get authentication info (for diagnostics)

                    		
                  

                  

                    660
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    661
                    
                    
                      
 * @return List with mode, has_token, url_encrypted

                    		
                  

                  

                    662
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    663
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_get_auth_info")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    664
                    9x
                    
                      
List cpp_get_auth_info() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    665
                    
                    
                      
    return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    666
                    18x
                    
                      
        Named("mode") = "secure",

                    		
                  

                  

                    667
                    27x
                    
                      
        Named("has_token") = autograder::config::USE_AUTHENTICATION && 

                    		
                  

                  

                    668
                    9x
                    
                      
                             autograder::config::ENCRYPTED_TOKEN_LEN > 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    669
                    27x
                    
                      
        Named("url_length") = static_cast<int>(autograder::config::ENCRYPTED_URL_LEN),

                    		
                  

                  

                    670
                    36x
                    
                      
        Named("token_length") = static_cast<int>(autograder::config::ENCRYPTED_TOKEN_LEN)

                    		
                  

                  

                    671
                    
                    
                      
    );

                    		
                  

                  

                    672
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    673
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    674
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    675
                    
                    
                      
// OPENMP PARALLEL FUNCTIONS

                    		
                  

                  

                    676
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    677
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    678
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    679
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Get OpenMP parallel processing info

                    		
                  

                  

                    680
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    681
                    
                    
                      
 * @return List with OpenMP status and configuration

                    		
                  

                  

                    682
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    683
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_openmp_info")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    684
                    !
                    
                      
List cpp_openmp_info() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    685
                    
                    
                      
    return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    686
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("available") = autograder::parallel::is_available(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    687
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("version") = autograder::parallel::version(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    688
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("max_threads") = autograder::parallel::is_available() ? 

                    		
                  

                  

                    689
                    !
                    
                      
            omp_get_max_threads() : 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    690
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("parallel_threshold") = static_cast<int>(autograder::parallel::PARALLEL_THRESHOLD)

                    		
                  

                  

                    691
                    
                    
                      
    );

                    		
                  

                  

                    692
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    693
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    694
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    695
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Parallel fast comparison for large numeric vectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    696
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    697
                    
                    
                      
 * Uses OpenMP to compare very large vectors in parallel.

                    		
                  

                  

                    698
                    
                    
                      
 * Falls back to sequential for small vectors.

                    		
                  

                  

                    699
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    700
                    
                    
                      
 * @param v1 First numeric vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    701
                    
                    
                      
 * @param v2 Second numeric vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    702
                    
                    
                      
 * @param tolerance Comparison tolerance

                    		
                  

                  

                    703
                    
                    
                      
 * @return LogicalVector TRUE if vectors are equal within tolerance

                    		
                  

                  

                    704
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    705
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_compare_parallel")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    706
                    !
                    
                      
LogicalVector cpp_compare_parallel(NumericVector v1, NumericVector v2, 

                    		
                  

                  

                    707
                    
                    
                      
                                   double tolerance = 1e-10) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    708
                    !
                    
                      
    if (v1.size() != v2.size()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    709
                    !
                    
                      
        return LogicalVector::create(false);

                    		
                  

                  

                    710
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    711
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    712
                    !
                    
                      
    R_xlen_t n = v1.size();

                    		
                  

                  

                    713
                    !
                    
                      
    bool result = true;

                    		
                  

                  

                    714
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    715
                    
                    
                      
#ifdef _OPENMP

                    		
                  

                  

                    716
                    !
                    
                      
    if (n >= autograder::parallel::PARALLEL_THRESHOLD) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    717
                    !
                    
                      
        int num_threads = autograder::parallel::get_num_threads(n);

                    		
                  

                  

                    718
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    719
                    
                    
                      
        #pragma omp parallel for num_threads(num_threads) schedule(static) shared(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    720
                    
                    
                      
        for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    721
                    
                    
                      
            if (!result) continue;  // Skip if already found mismatch

                    		
                  

                  

                    722
                    
                    
                      
            

                    		
                  

                  

                    723
                    
                    
                      
            double a = v1[i];

                    		
                  

                  

                    724
                    
                    
                      
            double b = v2[i];

                    		
                  

                  

                    725
                    
                    
                      
            

                    		
                  

                  

                    726
                    
                    
                      
            // Handle NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    727
                    
                    
                      
            bool a_na = NumericVector::is_na(a);

                    		
                  

                  

                    728
                    
                    
                      
            bool b_na = NumericVector::is_na(b);

                    		
                  

                  

                    729
                    
                    
                      
            if (a_na && b_na) continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    730
                    
                    
                      
            if (a_na || b_na) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    731
                    
                    
                      
                #pragma omp atomic write

                    		
                  

                  

                    732
                    
                    
                      
                result = false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    733
                    
                    
                      
                continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    734
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    735
                    
                    
                      
            

                    		
                  

                  

                    736
                    
                    
                      
            // Handle NaN

                    		
                  

                  

                    737
                    
                    
                      
            if (std::isnan(a) && std::isnan(b)) continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    738
                    
                    
                      
            if (std::isnan(a) || std::isnan(b)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    739
                    
                    
                      
                #pragma omp atomic write

                    		
                  

                  

                    740
                    
                    
                      
                result = false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    741
                    
                    
                      
                continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    742
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    743
                    
                    
                      
            

                    		
                  

                  

                    744
                    
                    
                      
            // Handle Inf

                    		
                  

                  

                    745
                    
                    
                      
            if (std::isinf(a) && std::isinf(b)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    746
                    
                    
                      
                if ((a > 0) != (b > 0)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    747
                    
                    
                      
                    #pragma omp atomic write

                    		
                  

                  

                    748
                    
                    
                      
                    result = false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    749
                    
                    
                      
                }

                    		
                  

                  

                    750
                    
                    
                      
                continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    751
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    752
                    
                    
                      
            if (std::isinf(a) || std::isinf(b)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    753
                    
                    
                      
                #pragma omp atomic write

                    		
                  

                  

                    754
                    
                    
                      
                result = false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    755
                    
                    
                      
                continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    756
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    757
                    
                    
                      
            

                    		
                  

                  

                    758
                    
                    
                      
            // Standard comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    759
                    
                    
                      
            if (std::abs(a - b) > tolerance) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    760
                    
                    
                      
                #pragma omp atomic write

                    		
                  

                  

                    761
                    
                    
                      
                result = false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    762
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    763
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    764
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    765
                    !
                    
                      
        return LogicalVector::create(result);

                    		
                  

                  

                    766
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    767
                    
                    
                      
#endif

                    		
                  

                  

                    768
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    769
                    
                    
                      
    // Sequential fallback

                    		
                  

                  

                    770
                    !
                    
                      
    autograder::compare::Comparator comp(tolerance);

                    		
                  

                  

                    771
                    !
                    
                      
    return LogicalVector::create(comp.equal(v1, v2));

                    		
                  

                  

                    772
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    773
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    774
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    775
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Parallel sum of absolute differences

                    		
                  

                  

                    776
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    777
                    
                    
                      
 * Computes sum of |v1[i] - v2[i]| using parallel reduction.

                    		
                  

                  

                    778
                    
                    
                      
 * Useful for computing total error metrics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    779
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    780
                    
                    
                      
 * @param v1 First numeric vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    781
                    
                    
                      
 * @param v2 Second numeric vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    782
                    
                    
                      
 * @return NumericVector with single value (sum of absolute differences)

                    		
                  

                  

                    783
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    784
                    
                    
                      
// [[Rcpp::export(".cpp_sum_abs_diff")]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    785
                    !
                    
                      
NumericVector cpp_sum_abs_diff(NumericVector v1, NumericVector v2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    786
                    !
                    
                      
    R_xlen_t n = std::min(v1.size(), v2.size());

                    		
                  

                  

                    787
                    !
                    
                      
    double total = 0.0;

                    		
                  

                  

                    788
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    789
                    
                    
                      
#ifdef _OPENMP

                    		
                  

                  

                    790
                    !
                    
                      
    if (n >= autograder::parallel::PARALLEL_THRESHOLD) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    791
                    
                    
                      
        #pragma omp parallel for reduction(+:total) schedule(static)

                    		
                  

                  

                    792
                    
                    
                      
        for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    793
                    
                    
                      
            double a = v1[i];

                    		
                  

                  

                    794
                    
                    
                      
            double b = v2[i];

                    		
                  

                  

                    795
                    
                    
                      
            

                    		
                  

                  

                    796
                    
                    
                      
            // Skip NA/NaN/Inf

                    		
                  

                  

                    797
                    
                    
                      
            if (NumericVector::is_na(a) || NumericVector::is_na(b)) continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    798
                    
                    
                      
            if (std::isnan(a) || std::isnan(b)) continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    799
                    
                    
                      
            if (std::isinf(a) || std::isinf(b)) continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    800
                    
                    
                      
            

                    		
                  

                  

                    801
                    
                    
                      
            total += std::abs(a - b);

                    		
                  

                  

                    802
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    803
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    804
                    !
                    
                      
        return NumericVector::create(total);

                    		
                  

                  

                    805
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    806
                    
                    
                      
#endif

                    		
                  

                  

                    807
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    808
                    
                    
                      
    // Sequential fallback

                    		
                  

                  

                    809
                    !
                    
                      
    for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    810
                    !
                    
                      
        double a = v1[i];

                    		
                  

                  

                    811
                    !
                    
                      
        double b = v2[i];

                    		
                  

                  

                    812
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    813
                    !
                    
                      
        if (NumericVector::is_na(a) || NumericVector::is_na(b)) continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    814
                    !
                    
                      
        if (std::isnan(a) || std::isnan(b)) continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    815
                    !
                    
                      
        if (std::isinf(a) || std::isinf(b)) continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    816
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    817
                    !
                    
                      
        total += std::abs(a - b);

                    		
                  

                  

                    818
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    819
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    820
                    !
                    
                      
    return NumericVector::create(total);

                    		
                  

                  

                    821
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
// AUTOGRADER - OPENMP CONFIGURATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
// File: omp_config.h

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
// Purpose: OpenMP configuration and portability macros

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
// Author: Reijel Agub (rcagub@up.edu.ph)

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
// Version: 0.4.0

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
// License: MIT

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#ifndef AUTOGRADER_OMP_CONFIG_H

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#define AUTOGRADER_OMP_CONFIG_H

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#include <Rcpp.h>  // For R_xlen_t

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#include <string>

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#include <algorithm>  // For std::min

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#include <cstring>    // For memset

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
// Include OpenMP if available

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#ifdef _OPENMP

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    #include <omp.h>

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    #define AUTOGRADER_PARALLEL 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#else

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    #define AUTOGRADER_PARALLEL 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    // Provide stub definitions for systems without OpenMP

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    inline int omp_get_max_threads() { return 1; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    inline int omp_get_thread_num() { return 0; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    inline int omp_get_num_threads() { return 1; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    inline void omp_set_num_threads(int) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#endif

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
namespace autograder {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
// SECURE MEMORY UTILITIES

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
namespace security {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Securely clear sensitive data from memory

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
 * Uses volatile pointer to prevent compiler optimization from

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
 * removing the clearing operation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
 * @param data Pointer to data to clear

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
 * @param size Size in bytes to clear

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
inline void secure_clear(void* data, size_t size) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
    if (data != nullptr && size > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
        volatile unsigned char* p = static_cast<volatile unsigned char*>(data);

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
        for (size_t i = 0; i < size; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
            p[i] = 0;

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Securely clear a string

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
 * @param s String to clear

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
inline void secure_clear_string(std::string& s) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
    if (!s.empty()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
        secure_clear(&s[0], s.size());

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
        s.clear();

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief RAII wrapper for secure string clearing

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
 * Automatically clears the string when destroyed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
class SecureString {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
public:

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
    SecureString() = default;

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
    explicit SecureString(const std::string& s) : data_(s) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
    explicit SecureString(std::string&& s) : data_(std::move(s)) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    ~SecureString() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
        secure_clear_string(data_);

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
    // Prevent copying (security measure)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
    SecureString(const SecureString&) = delete;

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
    SecureString& operator=(const SecureString&) = delete;

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    // Allow moving

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
    SecureString(SecureString&& other) noexcept : data_(std::move(other.data_)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
        other.data_.clear();

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
    SecureString& operator=(SecureString&& other) noexcept {

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
        if (this != &other) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
            secure_clear_string(data_);

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
            data_ = std::move(other.data_);

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
            other.data_.clear();

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
        return *this;

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    const std::string& get() const { return data_; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
    std::string& get() { return data_; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    size_t size() const { return data_.size(); }

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
    bool empty() const { return data_.empty(); }

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
private:

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
    std::string data_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace security

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
// OPENMP PARALLEL CONFIGURATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
namespace parallel {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
// Maximum threads to use (prevent oversubscription)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
constexpr int MAX_THREADS = 8;

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
// Minimum elements per thread for efficiency

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
constexpr R_xlen_t MIN_ELEMENTS_PER_THREAD = 2500;

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Get dynamically computed parallel threshold

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
 * Adjusts threshold based on available cores for optimal performance.

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
 * More cores = lower threshold is beneficial.

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
 * @return Optimal minimum vector size for parallelization

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
inline R_xlen_t get_parallel_threshold() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#ifdef _OPENMP

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
    static R_xlen_t cached_threshold = 0;

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
    if (cached_threshold == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
