        int cores = omp_get_max_threads();

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
        // Base threshold of 10000, reduced for more cores

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
        // Formula: max(5000, 50000 / cores)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
        // 4 cores -> 12500, 8 cores -> 6250, 16 cores -> 5000

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    !
                    
                      
        cached_threshold = std::max(static_cast<R_xlen_t>(5000), 

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    !
                    
                      
                                    static_cast<R_xlen_t>(50000 / cores));

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    !
                    
                      
    return cached_threshold;

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#else

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
    return 10000;  // Default for non-OpenMP builds

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#endif

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
// Keep PARALLEL_THRESHOLD for backward compatibility

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
constexpr R_xlen_t PARALLEL_THRESHOLD = 10000;

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Get optimal thread count for given workload

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
 * @param n Size of data to process

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
 * @return Number of threads to use

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
inline int get_num_threads(R_xlen_t n) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#ifdef _OPENMP

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    !
                    
                      
    R_xlen_t threshold = get_parallel_threshold();

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
    if (n < threshold) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
        return 1;  // Too small for parallelization

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    !
                    
                      
    int available = omp_get_max_threads();

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    !
                    
                      
    int optimal = std::min(available, MAX_THREADS);

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
    // Ensure we have enough work per thread

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    !
                    
                      
    int max_useful = static_cast<int>(n / MIN_ELEMENTS_PER_THREAD);

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    !
                    
                      
    return std::max(1, std::min(optimal, max_useful));

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#else

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
    return 1;

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#endif

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Check if OpenMP is available

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
 * @return true if OpenMP support is compiled in

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    !
                    
                      
inline bool is_available() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#ifdef _OPENMP

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    !
                    
                      
    return true;

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#else

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
    return false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#endif

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Get OpenMP version string

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
 * @return OpenMP version or "not available"

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    !
                    
                      
inline std::string version() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#ifdef _OPENMP

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    !
                    
                      
    int version = _OPENMP;

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
    // Format: YYYYMM

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    !
                    
                      
    int year = version / 100;

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    !
                    
                      
    int month = version % 100;

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    !
                    
                      
    return std::to_string(year) + "." + std::to_string(month);

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#else

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
    return "not available";

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#endif

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace parallel

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace autograder

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#endif // AUTOGRADER_OMP_CONFIG_H

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
// AUTOGRADER - TYPE DEFINITIONS

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
// File: core/types.hpp

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
// Purpose: Common type definitions and forward declarations

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
// Author: Reijel Agub (rcagub@up.edu.ph)

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
// Version: 0.4.0

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
// License: MIT

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#ifndef AUTOGRADER_TYPES_HPP

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#define AUTOGRADER_TYPES_HPP

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#include <string>

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#include <vector>

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#include <cstdint>

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#include <memory>

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#include <functional>

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
namespace autograder {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
// TYPE ALIASES

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
using ByteVector = std::vector<uint8_t>;

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
using StringVector = std::vector<std::string>;

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
// ENCRYPTION TYPES

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Encryption algorithm identifier

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
enum class EncryptionAlgorithm {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    NONE,           // No encryption

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    XOR_SIMPLE,     // Simple XOR cipher

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    AES_SBOX,       // AES S-box based encryption

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    AES_256_CBC     // Full AES-256 CBC mode

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Result of encryption/decryption operation

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
struct CryptoResult {

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
    bool success;

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
    std::string data;

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
    std::string error_message;

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    CryptoResult() : success(false) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    269x
                    
                      
    CryptoResult(bool s, const std::string& d) : success(s), data(d) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
    CryptoResult(const std::string& err) : success(false), error_message(err) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
// COMPARISON TYPES

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Result of comparison operation

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
struct ComparisonResult {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
    bool equal;

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    size_t first_diff_index;

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    std::string diff_description;

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
    ComparisonResult() : equal(true), first_diff_index(0) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    326x
                    
                      
    ComparisonResult(bool eq) : equal(eq), first_diff_index(0) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    97x
                    
                      
    ComparisonResult(size_t idx, const std::string& desc) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    97x
                    
                      
        : equal(false), first_diff_index(idx), diff_description(desc) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
// VALIDATION TYPES

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Result of validation operation

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
struct ValidationResult {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    bool valid;

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
    std::string error_message;

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
    std::string sanitized_input;

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
    ValidationResult() : valid(false) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
    explicit ValidationResult(bool v) : valid(v) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    133x
                    
                      
    ValidationResult(bool v, const std::string& sanitized) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    133x
                    
                      
        : valid(v), sanitized_input(sanitized) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    20x
                    
                      
    ValidationResult(const std::string& err) : valid(false), error_message(err) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    // Add const char* constructor to avoid implicit bool conversion

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    249x
                    
                      
    ValidationResult(const char* err) : valid(false), error_message(err) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
// NETWORK TYPES

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief HTTP response structure

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
struct HttpResponse {

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
    int status_code;

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    std::string body;

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
    std::string content_type;

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
    bool success;

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
    std::string error_message;

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
    HttpResponse() : status_code(0), success(false) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
    HttpResponse(int code, const std::string& b) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
        : status_code(code), body(b), success(code >= 200 && code < 300) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
// CONFIGURATION TYPES

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Authentication mode for repository access

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
enum class AuthMode {

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
    NONE,           // No authentication configured yet

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
    GITHUB_TOKEN,   // GitHub Personal Access Token

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
    OAUTH           // OAuth2 flow (future)

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Autograder configuration structure

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
struct Config {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
    std::string base_url;

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
    int timeout_seconds;

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
    double default_tolerance;

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
    bool enable_parallel;

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
    int max_threads;

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
    EncryptionAlgorithm encryption;

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
    AuthMode auth_mode;

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
    std::string auth_token;  // Encrypted token, decrypted at runtime

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    27x
                    
                      
    Config() 

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    54x
                    
                      
        : base_url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KingSSIBAL/R-Function-checker/main/repo")

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    27x
                    
                      
        , timeout_seconds(30)

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    27x
                    
                      
        , default_tolerance(1e-10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    27x
                    
                      
        , enable_parallel(true)

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    27x
                    
                      
        , max_threads(4)

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    27x
                    
                      
        , encryption(EncryptionAlgorithm::AES_SBOX)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    27x
                    
                      
        , auth_mode(AuthMode::NONE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    81x
                    
                      
        , auth_token("") {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace autograder

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#endif // AUTOGRADER_TYPES_HPP

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1

                    4
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
// File: compare/comparator.cpp

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
// Purpose: Implementation of high-performance comparison functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
//          with OpenMP parallelization for large vectors

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
//

#include "comparator.h"

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#include <limits>

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#include <atomic>

                    20

// COMPARATOR IMPLEMENTATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    !
                    
                      
Comparator::Comparator() 

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
    : tolerance_(1e-10) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    354x
                    
                      
Comparator::Comparator(double tolerance) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    354x
                    
                      
    : tolerance_(tolerance) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
void Comparator::set_tolerance(double tolerance) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
    tolerance_ = tolerance;

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
double Comparator::get_tolerance() const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
    return tolerance_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    200293x
                    
                      
bool Comparator::doubles_equal(double a, double b) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    // Handle NA values

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    200293x
                    
                      
    if (is_na_double(a) && is_na_double(b)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    10x
                    
                      
        return true;

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    200283x
                    
                      
    if (is_na_double(a) || is_na_double(b)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    4x
                    
                      
        return false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    // Handle infinity

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    200279x
                    
                      
    if (std::isinf(a) && std::isinf(b)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    6x
                    
                      
        return (a > 0) == (b > 0);  // Same sign infinity

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    // Handle NaN

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
    if (std::isnan(a) && std::isnan(b)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
        return true;

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
    if (std::isnan(a) || std::isnan(b)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
        return false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    // Standard tolerance comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    200273x
                    
                      
    return std::abs(a - b) <= tolerance_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    600869x
                    
                      
bool Comparator::is_na_double(double x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    600869x
                    
                      
    return Rcpp::NumericVector::is_na(x);

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    632220x
                    
                      
bool Comparator::is_na_int(int x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    632220x
                    
                      
    return Rcpp::IntegerVector::is_na(x);

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    423x
                    
                      
ComparisonResult Comparator::compare(SEXP obj1, SEXP obj2) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    // Type check first (O(1) operation)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    423x
                    
                      
    int type1 = TYPEOF(obj1);

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    423x
                    
                      
    int type2 = TYPEOF(obj2);

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    423x
                    
                      
    if (type1 != type2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    18x
                    
                      
        return ComparisonResult(0, "Type mismatch: " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    54x
                    
                      
                               get_type_name(obj1) + " vs " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    54x
                    
                      
                               get_type_name(obj2));

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    // Dispatch based on type

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    405x
                    
                      
    switch (type1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    113x
                    
                      
        case REALSXP:

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    226x
                    
                      
            return compare_numeric(Rcpp::NumericVector(obj1), 

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    339x
                    
                      
                                  Rcpp::NumericVector(obj2));

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    195x
                    
                      
        case INTSXP:

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    390x
                    
                      
            return compare_integer(Rcpp::IntegerVector(obj1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    585x
                    
                      
                                  Rcpp::IntegerVector(obj2));

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    29x
                    
                      
        case STRSXP:

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    58x
                    
                      
            return compare_character(Rcpp::CharacterVector(obj1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    87x
                    
                      
                                    Rcpp::CharacterVector(obj2));

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    15x
                    
                      
        case LGLSXP:

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    30x
                    
                      
            return compare_logical(Rcpp::LogicalVector(obj1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    45x
                    
                      
                                  Rcpp::LogicalVector(obj2));

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    43x
                    
                      
        case VECSXP:

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    43x
                    
                      
            return compare_list(Rcpp::List(obj1), Rcpp::List(obj2));

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    10x
                    
                      
        default:

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
            // Fall back to R's identical for complex types

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    20x
                    
                      
            Rcpp::Function identical("identical");

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    10x
                    
                      
            bool result = Rcpp::as<bool>(identical(obj1, obj2));

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    10x
                    
                      
            if (result) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    8x
                    
                      
                return ComparisonResult(true);

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
            } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    4x
                    
                      
                return ComparisonResult(0, "Objects differ (complex type comparison)");

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    343x
                    
                      
bool Comparator::equal(SEXP obj1, SEXP obj2) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    343x
                    
                      
    return compare(obj1, obj2).equal;

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    113x
                    
                      
ComparisonResult Comparator::compare_numeric(const Rcpp::NumericVector& v1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
                                             const Rcpp::NumericVector& v2) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
    // Size check

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    113x
                    
                      
    if (v1.size() != v2.size()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    3x
                    
                      
        return ComparisonResult(0, "Length mismatch: " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    9x
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(v1.size()) + " vs " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    9x
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(v2.size()));

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
    // Element-wise comparison with early termination

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    200369x
                    
                      
    for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < v1.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    200293x
                    
                      
        if (!doubles_equal(v1[i], v2[i])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    68x
                    
                      
            std::string desc = "Difference at index " + std::to_string(i + 1) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    136x
                    
                      
                              ": " + std::to_string(v1[i]) + " vs " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    102x
                    
                      
                              std::to_string(v2[i]);

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    34x
                    
                      
            return ComparisonResult(static_cast<size_t>(i), desc);

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    76x
                    
                      
    return ComparisonResult(true);

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    195x
                    
                      
ComparisonResult Comparator::compare_integer(const Rcpp::IntegerVector& v1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
                                             const Rcpp::IntegerVector& v2) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
    // Size check

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    195x
                    
                      
    if (v1.size() != v2.size()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    7x
                    
                      
        return ComparisonResult(0, "Length mismatch: " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    21x
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(v1.size()) + " vs " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    21x
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(v2.size()));

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
    // Element-wise comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    316297x
                    
                      
    for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < v1.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
        // Handle NA values

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    316110x
                    
                      
        bool na1 = is_na_int(v1[i]);

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    316110x
                    
                      
        bool na2 = is_na_int(v2[i]);

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
        if (na1 && na2) continue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    316110x
                    
                      
        if (na1 || na2 || v1[i] != v2[i]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    1x
                    
                      
            std::string desc = "Difference at index " + std::to_string(i + 1);

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    1x
                    
                      
            return ComparisonResult(static_cast<size_t>(i), desc);

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    187x
                    
                      
    return ComparisonResult(true);

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    29x
                    
                      
ComparisonResult Comparator::compare_character(const Rcpp::CharacterVector& v1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
                                               const Rcpp::CharacterVector& v2) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
    // Size check

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    29x
                    
                      
    if (v1.size() != v2.size()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    !
                    
                      
        return ComparisonResult(0, "Length mismatch: " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    !
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(v1.size()) + " vs " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    !
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(v2.size()));

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
    // Element-wise comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    60x
                    
                      
    for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < v1.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    43x
                    
                      
        if (v1[i] != v2[i]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    24x
                    
                      
            std::string desc = "Difference at index " + std::to_string(i + 1) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    48x
                    
                      
                              ": '" + Rcpp::as<std::string>(v1[i]) + "' vs '" + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    36x
                    
                      
                              Rcpp::as<std::string>(v2[i]) + "'";

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    12x
                    
                      
            return ComparisonResult(static_cast<size_t>(i), desc);

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    17x
                    
                      
    return ComparisonResult(true);

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    15x
                    
                      
ComparisonResult Comparator::compare_logical(const Rcpp::LogicalVector& v1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
                                             const Rcpp::LogicalVector& v2) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
    // Size check

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    15x
                    
                      
    if (v1.size() != v2.size()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    !
                    
                      
        return ComparisonResult(0, "Length mismatch: " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    !
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(v1.size()) + " vs " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    !
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(v2.size()));

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
    // Element-wise comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    29x
                    
                      
    for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < v1.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    17x
                    
                      
        if (v1[i] != v2[i]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    3x
                    
                      
            std::string desc = "Difference at index " + std::to_string(i + 1);

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    3x
                    
                      
            return ComparisonResult(static_cast<size_t>(i), desc);

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    12x
                    
                      
    return ComparisonResult(true);

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    !
                    
                      
ComparisonResult Comparator::compare_matrix(const Rcpp::NumericMatrix& m1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
                                            const Rcpp::NumericMatrix& m2) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
    // Dimension check

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    !
                    
                      
    if (m1.nrow() != m2.nrow() || m1.ncol() != m2.ncol()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    !
                    
                      
        return ComparisonResult(0, "Dimension mismatch: [" + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    !
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(m1.nrow()) + "x" + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    !
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(m1.ncol()) + "] vs [" +

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    !
