                    476
                    
                    
                      
// FREE FUNCTIONS

                    		
                  

                  

                    477
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    478
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    479
                    124x
                    
                      
std::string quick_encrypt(const std::string& plaintext, const std::string& key) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    480
                    124x
                    
                      
    Encryptor enc(key.empty() ? KeyDeriver::derive_default() : key);

                    		
                  

                  

                    481
                    248x
                    
                      
    return enc.encrypt_to_hex(plaintext);

                    		
                  

                  

                    482
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    483
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    484
                    115x
                    
                      
std::string quick_decrypt(const std::string& ciphertext, const std::string& key) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    485
                    115x
                    
                      
    Encryptor enc(key.empty() ? KeyDeriver::derive_default() : key);

                    		
                  

                  

                    486
                    230x
                    
                      
    return enc.decrypt_from_hex(ciphertext);

                    		
                  

                  

                    487
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    488
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    489
                    84x
                    
                      
std::string generate_random_key(size_t length) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    490
                    84x
                    
                      
    std::random_device rd;

                    		
                  

                  

                    491
                    84x
                    
                      
    std::mt19937 gen(rd());

                    		
                  

                  

                    492
                    84x
                    
                      
    std::uniform_int_distribution<> dis(0, 255);

                    		
                  

                  

                    493
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    494
                    84x
                    
                      
    std::string key;

                    		
                  

                  

                    495
                    84x
                    
                      
    key.reserve(length);

                    		
                  

                  

                    496
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    497
                    2909x
                    
                      
    for (size_t i = 0; i < length; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    498
                    2825x
                    
                      
        key += static_cast<char>(dis(gen));

                    		
                  

                  

                    499
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    500
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    501
                    84x
                    
                      
    return key;

                    		
                  

                  

                    502
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    503
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    504
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace crypto

                    		
                  

                  

                    505
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace autograder

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
// AUTOGRADER - CUSTOM EXCEPTION CLASSES

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
// File: core/exceptions.hpp

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
// Purpose: Exception hierarchy for autograder error handling

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
// Author: Reijel Agub (rcagub@up.edu.ph)

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
// Version: 0.4.0

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
// License: MIT

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#ifndef AUTOGRADER_EXCEPTIONS_HPP

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#define AUTOGRADER_EXCEPTIONS_HPP

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#include <stdexcept>

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#include <string>

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
namespace autograder {

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
// BASE EXCEPTION

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
 * @class AutograderException

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Base exception for all autograder-specific errors

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
 * Provides a common base for all autograder exceptions,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
 * enabling catch-all handling for autograder errors.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
class AutograderException : public std::runtime_error {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
public:

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    17x
                    
                      
    explicit AutograderException(const std::string& msg) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    17x
                    
                      
        : std::runtime_error(msg) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
    virtual const char* type() const noexcept { return "AutograderException"; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
// NETWORK EXCEPTIONS

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
 * @class NetworkException

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Exception for network-related failures

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
 * Thrown when:

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
 *   - Internet connection is unavailable

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
 *   - Download times out (>30 seconds)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
 *   - Server returns error code (5xx)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
 *   - DNS resolution fails

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
 *   - SSL/TLS handshake fails

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
class NetworkException : public AutograderException {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
public:

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
    explicit NetworkException(const std::string& msg) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
        : AutograderException(msg) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
    const char* type() const noexcept override { return "NetworkException"; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    65

                    67

                    68

                    71
                    
                    
                      
        : NetworkException(msg) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
    const char* type() const noexcept override { return "TimeoutException"; }

/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    135

                    136
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Base exception for resource-related errors

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
class ResourceException : public AutograderException {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
public:

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
    explicit ResourceException(const std::string& msg) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
        : AutograderException(msg) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    !
                    
                      
    const char* type() const noexcept override { return "ResourceException"; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
 * @class FunctionNotFoundException

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Exception for missing/nonexistent functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
class FunctionNotFoundException : public ResourceException {

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
private:

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
    std::string function_name_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
public:

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    !
                    
                      
    explicit FunctionNotFoundException(const std::string& function_name) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    !
                    
                      
        : ResourceException("Function '" + function_name + "' not found.\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
                          "Use list_problems() to see available functions.\n\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
                          "Common issues:\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
                          "  * Check spelling\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
                          "  * Ensure the function exists in the repository\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
                          "  * Verify your internet connection")

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
        , function_name_(function_name) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
    const char* type() const noexcept override { return "FunctionNotFoundException"; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
    const std::string& function_name() const noexcept { return function_name_; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    190

                    191

                    251

                    252

                    256
                    
                    
                      
#endif // AUTOGRADER_EXCEPTIONS_HPP

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
// AUTOGRADER - ENCRYPTED CONFIGURATION (AUTO-GENERATED)

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
// Generated: 2025-12-10 12:44:19

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
// DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#ifndef AUTOGRADER_ENCRYPTED_CONFIG_HPP

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#define AUTOGRADER_ENCRYPTED_CONFIG_HPP

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#include <cstdint>

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#include <string>

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#include <vector>

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#include "encryption.h"

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#include "types.h"

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
namespace autograder {

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
namespace config {

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
static const bool USE_AUTHENTICATION = true;

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
static const uint8_t ENCRYPTED_URL[] = {

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    0xe9, 0xc4, 0x20, 0xbf, 0x66, 0x80, 0x91, 0x18, 0x9c, 0xef, 0x6c, 0x2e, 0x01, 0x8f, 0xc4, 0x45,

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    0xaf, 0x95, 0xb4, 0xa4, 0xe4, 0x7a, 0x09, 0x7f, 0xe3, 0x98, 0x4c, 0x02, 0x6e, 0x05, 0x00, 0x7f,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    0x28, 0x66, 0x7f, 0x55, 0x8b, 0x85, 0x70, 0x52, 0xcc, 0x2c, 0x19, 0x32, 0x83, 0x2f, 0xee, 0x8f,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    0xa2, 0x98, 0x11, 0x9c, 0x3a, 0x56, 0x2c, 0x51, 0x5a, 0xea, 0x02, 0xef, 0x83, 0xf5, 0x72, 0xf9,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    0x98, 0x2a, 0x2f

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
static const size_t ENCRYPTED_URL_LEN = 67;

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
static const uint8_t ENCRYPTED_TOKEN[] = {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    0x69, 0x2a, 0x20, 0xce, 0x03, 0xaa, 0x86, 0x7f, 0x76, 0x92, 0x60, 0x86, 0xcf, 0x6a, 0xd5, 0xc3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    0x05, 0xcd, 0x41, 0x75, 0x0f, 0xa9, 0xa8, 0x4a, 0x4d, 0x32, 0x7f, 0x3c, 0x20, 0xfc, 0x83, 0x85,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    0x66, 0x0a, 0xfc, 0x98, 0x61, 0xc3, 0x6d, 0x83, 0x67, 0xa0, 0xbb, 0xde, 0x67, 0x31, 0x95, 0x1b,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    0x77, 0x19, 0xec, 0x30, 0xb8, 0x88, 0xd6, 0x50, 0xb6, 0x70, 0x21, 0x6e, 0x5a, 0xcb, 0x2c, 0xfc,

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    0xe6, 0x4f, 0xcb, 0xe8, 0x70, 0xda, 0x8d, 0xd2, 0xd8, 0xa8, 0xb8, 0x7a, 0x93, 0x3b, 0x62, 0x84,

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    0x27, 0x5f, 0x8c, 0x3f, 0xa7, 0x14, 0x1b, 0x2c, 0xa8, 0x35, 0x00, 0xeb, 0xda

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
static const size_t ENCRYPTED_TOKEN_LEN = 93;

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
static const char* KEY_FACTORS[] = {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    "AUTOGRADER_SECURE_KEY_2025",

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    "v0.4.0",

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    "R-FUNC-CHK",

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    "MODULAR-CPP"

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
static const size_t KEY_FACTORS_COUNT = 4;

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
inline std::string get_repository_url() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    !
                    
                      
    std::vector<std::string> factors;

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
    for (size_t i = 0; i < KEY_FACTORS_COUNT; ++i) factors.push_back(KEY_FACTORS[i]);

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string key = crypto::KeyDeriver::derive(factors, 32);

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string encrypted(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(ENCRYPTED_URL), ENCRYPTED_URL_LEN);

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
    crypto::Encryptor enc(key);

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
    auto result = enc.decrypt(encrypted);

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
    return result.success ? result.data : "";

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
inline std::string get_auth_token() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
    if (!USE_AUTHENTICATION || ENCRYPTED_TOKEN_LEN == 0) return "";

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    std::vector<std::string> factors;

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    for (size_t i = 0; i < KEY_FACTORS_COUNT; ++i) factors.push_back(KEY_FACTORS[i]);

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    std::string key = crypto::KeyDeriver::derive(factors, 32);

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    std::string encrypted(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(ENCRYPTED_TOKEN), ENCRYPTED_TOKEN_LEN);

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
    crypto::Encryptor enc(key);

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    auto result = enc.decrypt(encrypted);

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
    return result.success ? result.data : "";

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
inline bool is_authentication_enabled() { return USE_AUTHENTICATION; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
inline AuthMode get_auth_mode() { return USE_AUTHENTICATION ? AuthMode::GITHUB_TOKEN : AuthMode::NONE; }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
inline Config get_config() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
    Config cfg;

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
    cfg.base_url = get_repository_url();

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    cfg.auth_mode = get_auth_mode();

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
    cfg.auth_token = get_auth_token();

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
    return cfg;

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace config

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace autograder

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#endif // AUTOGRADER_ENCRYPTED_CONFIG_HPP

                    		
                  

                  

                    84

// File: network/fetcher.cpp
