                    !
                    
                      
                ss << format_number(vec[i]);

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
        ss << " ... ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    !
                    
                      
        ss << "numeric[" << vec.size() << "] = ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    !
                    
                      
        if (Rcpp::NumericVector::is_na(vec[vec.size() - 1])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
            ss << "NA";

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    !
                    
                      
            ss << format_number(vec[vec.size() - 1]);

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    19x
                    
                      
    return truncate(ss.str(), max_length_);

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    207x
                    
                      
std::string Formatter::format_integer(const Rcpp::IntegerVector& vec) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    207x
                    
                      
    if (vec.size() == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
        return "integer(0)";

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    207x
                    
                      
    std::ostringstream ss;

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    207x
                    
                      
    if (vec.size() <= MAX_VECTOR_ELEMENTS) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    21x
                    
                      
        ss << "c(";

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    102x
                    
                      
        for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    81x
                    
                      
            if (i > 0) ss << ", ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    81x
                    
                      
            if (Rcpp::IntegerVector::is_na(vec[i])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
                ss << "NA";

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
            } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    81x
                    
                      
                ss << vec[i] << "L";

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    21x
                    
                      
        ss << ")";

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    186x
                    
                      
        ss << "integer[1:" << vec.size() << "] = ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    744x
                    
                      
        for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    558x
                    
                      
            if (i > 0) ss << ", ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    558x
                    
                      
            if (Rcpp::IntegerVector::is_na(vec[i])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
                ss << "NA";

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
            } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    558x
                    
                      
                ss << vec[i];

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    186x
                    
                      
        ss << " ... ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    186x
                    
                      
        ss << "integer[" << vec.size() << "] = ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    186x
                    
                      
        if (Rcpp::IntegerVector::is_na(vec[vec.size() - 1])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    !
                    
                      
            ss << "NA";

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    186x
                    
                      
            ss << vec[vec.size() - 1];

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    207x
                    
                      
    return truncate(ss.str(), max_length_);

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    8x
                    
                      
std::string Formatter::format_character(const Rcpp::CharacterVector& vec) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    8x
                    
                      
    if (vec.size() == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    !
                    
                      
        return "character(0)";

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    8x
                    
                      
    std::ostringstream ss;

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    8x
                    
                      
    if (vec.size() <= MAX_VECTOR_ELEMENTS) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    8x
                    
                      
        ss << "c(";

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    23x
                    
                      
        for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    15x
                    
                      
            if (i > 0) ss << ", ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    15x
                    
                      
            ss << "\"" << Rcpp::as<std::string>(vec[i]) << "\"";

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    8x
                    
                      
        ss << ")";

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    !
                    
                      
        ss << "character[1:" << vec.size() << "] = \"";

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    !
                    
                      
        ss << Rcpp::as<std::string>(vec[0]) << "\", ...";

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    8x
                    
                      
    return truncate(ss.str(), max_length_);

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    7x
                    
                      
std::string Formatter::format_logical(const Rcpp::LogicalVector& vec) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    7x
                    
                      
    if (vec.size() == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    !
                    
                      
        return "logical(0)";

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    7x
                    
                      
    std::ostringstream ss;

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    7x
                    
                      
    if (vec.size() <= MAX_VECTOR_ELEMENTS) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    7x
                    
                      
        ss << "c(";

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    17x
                    
                      
        for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    10x
                    
                      
            if (i > 0) ss << ", ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    10x
                    
                      
            if (Rcpp::LogicalVector::is_na(vec[i])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    1x
                    
                      
                ss << "NA";

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
            } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    9x
                    
                      
                ss << (vec[i] ? "TRUE" : "FALSE");

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    7x
                    
                      
        ss << ")";

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    !
                    
                      
        ss << "logical[1:" << vec.size() << "]";

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    7x
                    
                      
    return truncate(ss.str(), max_length_);

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    19x
                    
                      
std::string Formatter::format_list(const Rcpp::List& lst) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    19x
                    
                      
    if (lst.size() == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    2x
                    
                      
        return "list()";

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    18x
                    
                      
    std::ostringstream ss;

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    18x
                    
                      
    if (lst.size() <= MAX_LIST_ELEMENTS) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    15x
                    
                      
        ss << "list(";

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    15x
                    
                      
        Rcpp::CharacterVector names = lst.names();

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    38x
                    
                      
        for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < lst.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    23x
                    
                      
            if (i > 0) ss << ", ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
            if (names.size() > i && names[i] != "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    23x
                    
                      
                ss << Rcpp::as<std::string>(names[i]) << " = ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    23x
                    
                      
            ss << format(lst[i]);

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    15x
                    
                      
        ss << ")";

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    3x
                    
                      
        ss << "list(length=" << lst.size() << ", first 3: ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    12x
                    
                      
        for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    9x
                    
                      
            if (i > 0) ss << ", ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    9x
                    
                      
            ss << format(lst[i]);

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    3x
                    
                      
        ss << ", ...)";

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    18x
                    
                      
    return truncate(ss.str(), max_length_);

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    !
                    
                      
std::string Formatter::format_matrix(const Rcpp::NumericMatrix& mat) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    !
                    
                      
    std::ostringstream ss;

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    !
                    
                      
    ss << "matrix[" << mat.nrow() << "x" << mat.ncol() << "]: ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
    // Show first few elements

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    !
                    
                      
    int count = 0;

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    !
                    
                      
    for (int i = 0; i < mat.nrow() && count < 3; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    !
                    
                      
        for (int j = 0; j < mat.ncol() && count < 3; ++j) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    !
                    
                      
            if (count > 0) ss << ", ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    !
                    
                      
            ss << format_number(mat(i, j));

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    !
                    
                      
            ++count;

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    !
                    
                      
    ss << " ...";

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    !
                    
                      
    return truncate(ss.str(), max_length_);

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    !
                    
                      
std::string Formatter::format_dataframe(const Rcpp::DataFrame& df) const {

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    !
                    
                      
    std::ostringstream ss;

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    !
                    
                      
    ss << "data.frame[" << df.nrows() << " x " << df.size() << "] columns: ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    !
                    
                      
    Rcpp::CharacterVector names = df.names();

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    !
                    
                      
    for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < names.size() && i < 5; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    !
                    
                      
        if (i > 0) ss << ", ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    !
                    
                      
        ss << Rcpp::as<std::string>(names[i]);

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    !
                    
                      
    if (names.size() > 5) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    !
                    
                      
        ss << ", ...";

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    !
                    
                      
    return truncate(ss.str(), max_length_);

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
// FEEDBACK FORMATTER IMPLEMENTATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    !
                    
                      
std::string FeedbackFormatter::type_mismatch(const std::string& expected, 

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
                                              const std::string& actual) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    !
                    
                      
    return "Type mismatch: Expected " + expected + " but got " + actual;

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    !
                    
                      
std::string FeedbackFormatter::length_mismatch(size_t expected, size_t actual) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    !
                    
                      
    return "Length mismatch: Expected length " + std::to_string(expected) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    !
                    
                      
           " but got " + std::to_string(actual);

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    !
                    
                      
std::string FeedbackFormatter::value_differences(const std::vector<size_t>& indices) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    !
                    
                      
    std::ostringstream ss;

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    !
                    
                      
    ss << "Differences at positions: ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    !
                    
                      
    for (size_t i = 0; i < indices.size() && i < 5; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    !
                    
                      
        if (i > 0) ss << ", ";

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    !
                    
                      
        ss << (indices[i] + 1);  // Convert to 1-based indexing

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    !
                    
                      
    if (indices.size() > 5) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    !
                    
                      
        ss << " ...";

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    !
                    
                      
    return ss.str();

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    !
                    
                      
std::string FeedbackFormatter::hint(const std::string& hint_text) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    !
                    
                      
    if (hint_text.empty()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    !
                    
                      
        return "";

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    !
                    
                      
    return "Hint: " + hint_text;

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    !
                    
                      
std::string FeedbackFormatter::test_header(int test_num, const std::string& description,

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
                                            int points, bool passed) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    !
                    
                      
    std::ostringstream ss;

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    !
                    
                      
    ss << "[Test " << test_num << "] " << description 

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    !
                    
                      
       << " (" << points << " pt): " 

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    !
                    
                      
       << (passed ? "PASS" : "FAIL");

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    !
                    
                      
    return ss.str();

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    !
                    
                      
std::string FeedbackFormatter::summary(int passed, int total, int score, int max_score) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    !
                    
                      
    std::ostringstream ss;

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    !
                    
                      
    ss << "\n=== Summary ===\n";

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    !
                    
                      
    ss << "Score: " << score << "/" << max_score << " points (";

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    !
                    
                      
    ss << std::fixed << std::setprecision(1) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    !
                    
                      
       << (static_cast<double>(score) / max_score * 100) << "%)\n";

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    !
                    
                      
    ss << "Tests: " << passed << "/" << total << " passed (";

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    !
                    
                      
    ss << std::fixed << std::setprecision(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    !
                    
                      
       << (static_cast<double>(passed) / total * 100) << "%)";

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    !
                    
                      
    return ss.str();

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace format

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace autograder

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
// AUTOGRADER - SECURITY MODULE IMPLEMENTATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
// File: security.cpp

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
// Purpose: Implementation of security utilities

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
// Author: Reijel Agub (rcagub@up.edu.ph)

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
// Version: 0.4.0

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
// License: MIT

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#include "security.h"

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#include <regex>

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#include <algorithm>

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#include <sstream>

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#include <iomanip>

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#include <ctime>

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#include <random>

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#ifdef _WIN32

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#include <windows.h>

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#include <wincrypt.h>

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#pragma comment(lib, "advapi32.lib")

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#else

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#include <fstream>

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#include <unistd.h>

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#endif

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
namespace autograder {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
namespace security {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
// DANGEROUS PATTERNS DEFINITION

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
// These patterns are compiled into the binary, making them harder to discover

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
// or bypass compared to R source code definitions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
const std::array<DangerousPattern, 10> CodeValidator::DANGEROUS_PATTERNS = {{

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    // System command execution - CRITICAL

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
        "system_exec",

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
        "\\b(system|system2|shell|shell\\.exec)\\s*\\(",

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
        "System command execution",

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
        PatternSeverity::CRITICAL

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
    // R session termination - CRITICAL

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
        "quit_r",

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
        "\\b(quit|q)\\s*\\(\\s*\\)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
        "R session termination",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
        PatternSeverity::CRITICAL

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
    // File system modifications - HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
        "file_delete",

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
        "\\b(unlink|file\\.remove|file\\.rename|dir\\.create)\\s*\\(",

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
        "File system modification",

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
        PatternSeverity::HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    // Environment manipulation - HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
        "env_modify",

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
        "\\b(Sys\\.setenv|Sys\\.unsetenv)\\s*\\(",

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
        "Environment variable modification",

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
        PatternSeverity::HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    // Dynamic code loading - HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
        "dynamic_load",

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
        "\\b(dyn\\.load|library\\.dynam)\\s*\\(",

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
        "Dynamic library loading",

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
        PatternSeverity::HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
    // Registry manipulation (Windows) - HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
        "registry",

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
        "\\b(readRegistry|setRegistry)\\s*\\(",

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
        "Windows registry access",

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
        PatternSeverity::HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    // Network downloads to disk - MEDIUM

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
        "download",

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
        "\\b(download\\.file|curl_download)\\s*\\(",

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
        "File download to disk",

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
        PatternSeverity::MEDIUM

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
    // Connection to external resources - MEDIUM

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
        "external_conn",

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
        "\\b(socketConnection|pipe|fifo)\\s*\\(",

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
        "External connection creation",

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
        PatternSeverity::MEDIUM

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
    // Dangerous eval patterns - HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
        "eval_parse",

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
        "\\beval\\s*\\(\\s*parse\\s*\\(",

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
        "Dynamic code evaluation",

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
        PatternSeverity::HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
    // Source external files - HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
        "source_external",

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
        "\\bsource\\s*\\(\\s*[\"']https?://",

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
        "Remote code sourcing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
        PatternSeverity::HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
}};

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
// CODE VALIDATOR IMPLEMENTATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    268x
                    
                      
bool CodeValidator::matches_pattern(const std::string& code, const char* pattern) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
    try {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    268x
                    
                      
        std::regex re(pattern, std::regex::ECMAScript | std::regex::icase);

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    268x
                    
                      
        return std::regex_search(code, re);

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    268x
                    
                      
    } catch (const std::regex_error&) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
        // If regex fails, do simple substring search as fallback

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
        return code.find(pattern) != std::string::npos;

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    27x
                    
                      
CodeValidationResult CodeValidator::validate(const std::string& code, bool strict) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    27x
                    
                      
    CodeValidationResult result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    27x
                    
                      
    result.safe = true;

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    297x
                    
                      
    for (const auto& pattern : DANGEROUS_PATTERNS) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
        // In strict mode, check all severities

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
        // In non-strict mode, only check CRITICAL and HIGH

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    280x
                    
                      
        bool should_check = strict || 

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    10x
                    
                      
                           (pattern.severity == PatternSeverity::CRITICAL ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    8x
                    
                      
                            pattern.severity == PatternSeverity::HIGH);

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
        

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    270x
                    
                      
        if (should_check && matches_pattern(code, pattern.pattern)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    15x
                    
                      
            result.safe = false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    30x
                    
                      
            result.violations.push_back(pattern.name);

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
            

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    15x
                    
                      
            switch (pattern.severity) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    6x
                    
                      
                case PatternSeverity::CRITICAL:

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    12x
                    
                      
                    result.severities.push_back("critical");

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    6x
                    
                      
                    break;

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    8x
                    
                      
                case PatternSeverity::HIGH:

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    16x
                    
                      
                    result.severities.push_back("high");

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    8x
                    
                      
                    break;

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    1x
                    
                      
                case PatternSeverity::MEDIUM:

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    2x
                    
                      
                    result.severities.push_back("medium");

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    1x
                    
                      
                    break;

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    27x
                    
                      
    if (!result.safe) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    15x
                    
                      
        std::ostringstream oss;

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    15x
                    
                      
        oss << "Code contains potentially dangerous operations:\n";

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    30x
                    
                      
        for (size_t i = 0; i < result.violations.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
            // Find the pattern description

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    42x
                    
                      
            for (const auto& p : DANGEROUS_PATTERNS) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    42x
                    
                      
                if (result.violations[i] == p.name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    15x
                    
                      
                    oss << "  - " << p.description << " (" << result.severities[i] << " severity)\n";

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    15x
                    
                      
                    break;

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
                }

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    15x
                    
                      
        result.error_message = oss.str();

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    27x
                    
                      
    return result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    !
                    
                      
bool CodeValidator::contains_dangerous_patterns(const std::string& code) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    !
                    
                      
    for (const auto& pattern : DANGEROUS_PATTERNS) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    !
                    
                      
        if (matches_pattern(code, pattern.pattern)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    !
                    
                      
            return true;

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    !
                    
                      
    return false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    !
                    
                      
std::vector<std::string> CodeValidator::get_pattern_names() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    !
                    
                      
    std::vector<std::string> names;

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    !
                    
                      
    names.reserve(DANGEROUS_PATTERNS.size());

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    !
                    
                      
    for (const auto& pattern : DANGEROUS_PATTERNS) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    !
                    
                      
        names.push_back(pattern.name);

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    !
                    
                      
    return names;

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
}
