namespace security {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
// DANGEROUS CODE PATTERNS

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Severity levels for dangerous patterns

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
enum class PatternSeverity {

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    CRITICAL,   // Must block immediately (system exec, quit)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
    HIGH,       // Should block (file delete, env modify)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
    MEDIUM      // Warn or block depending on mode

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Information about a dangerous pattern

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
struct DangerousPattern {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    const char* name;

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    const char* pattern;

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
    const char* description;

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    PatternSeverity severity;

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Result of code safety validation

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
struct CodeValidationResult {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    bool safe;

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
    std::vector<std::string> violations;

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    std::vector<std::string> severities;

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
    std::string error_message;

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    27x
                    
                      
    CodeValidationResult() : safe(true) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    CodeValidationResult(bool s) : safe(s) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
// CODE VALIDATOR CLASS

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
 * @class CodeValidator

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Validates R code for dangerous patterns

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
 * Scans code for potentially dangerous operations that should not

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
 * appear in instructor code. Patterns are compiled into the binary

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
 * for security (not visible in R source).

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
class CodeValidator {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
public:

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Validate code for dangerous patterns

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
     * @param code R code as string

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
     * @param strict If true, reject all severity levels. If false, only critical/high.

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
     * @return CodeValidationResult with details

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
    static CodeValidationResult validate(const std::string& code, bool strict = true);

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Check if code contains any dangerous pattern

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
     * @param code R code as string

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
     * @return true if dangerous patterns found

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
    static bool contains_dangerous_patterns(const std::string& code);

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Get list of all dangerous pattern names (for testing)

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
     * @return Vector of pattern names

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    static std::vector<std::string> get_pattern_names();

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
private:

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
    // Static array of dangerous patterns (compiled into binary)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
    static const std::array<DangerousPattern, 10> DANGEROUS_PATTERNS;

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
    // Check single pattern against code

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
    static bool matches_pattern(const std::string& code, const char* pattern);

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
// RATE LIMITER CLASS

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
 * @class RateLimiter

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Thread-safe rate limiting for API calls

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
 * Implements a sliding window rate limiter to prevent API abuse.

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
 * State is maintained in C++ for harder manipulation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
class RateLimiter {

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
public:

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Get singleton instance

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
    static RateLimiter& instance();

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Configure rate limiting parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
     * @param max_calls Maximum calls per window

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
     * @param window_seconds Window duration in seconds

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
    void configure(int max_calls, int window_seconds);

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Check if request is within rate limits

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
     * @param action Action name for logging

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
     * @return true if within limits, false if exceeded

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
    bool check_limit(const std::string& action = "api_call");

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Get current rate limit status

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
     * @return Tuple of (calls_remaining, window_remaining_seconds)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
    std::pair<int, int> get_status() const;

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Reset rate limiter state

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
    void reset();

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Get current configuration

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
     * @return Tuple of (max_calls, window_seconds)

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
    std::pair<int, int> get_config() const;

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
private:

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
    RateLimiter();

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    1x
                    
                      
    ~RateLimiter() = default;

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
    RateLimiter(const RateLimiter&) = delete;

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
    RateLimiter& operator=(const RateLimiter&) = delete;

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
    mutable std::mutex mutex_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
    std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point window_start_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
    std::atomic<int> call_count_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
    int max_calls_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
    int window_seconds_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
    bool initialized_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
// SECURE RANDOM CLASS

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
 * @class SecureRandom

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Cryptographically secure random number generation

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
 * Uses platform-specific secure random sources:

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
 *   - Windows: CryptGenRandom / BCryptGenRandom

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
 *   - Unix: /dev/urandom

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
 *   - Fallback: std::random_device with seeding

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
class SecureRandom {

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
public:

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Generate secure random bytes

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
     * @param count Number of bytes to generate

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
     * @return Vector of random bytes

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
    static std::vector<uint8_t> generate_bytes(size_t count);

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Generate secure random bytes as hex string

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
     * @param count Number of bytes to generate

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
     * @return Hex-encoded string of random bytes

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
    static std::string generate_hex(size_t count);

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Generate a random integer in range [min, max]

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
     * @param min Minimum value (inclusive)

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
     * @param max Maximum value (inclusive)

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
     * @return Random integer

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
    static int generate_int(int min, int max);

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
private:

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
    // Platform-specific implementation

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
    static bool fill_random_bytes(uint8_t* buffer, size_t count);

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
// AUDIT LOGGER CLASS

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Single audit log entry

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
struct AuditEntry {

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
    std::string timestamp;

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
    std::string event;

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
    std::string details;

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
    int session_pid;

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
    std::string user;

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
/**

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
 * @class AuditLogger

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
 * @brief Security event audit logging

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
 * 

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
 * Maintains an in-memory log of security events for forensics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
 * Thread-safe implementation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
 */

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
class AuditLogger {

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
public:

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Get singleton instance

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
    static AuditLogger& instance();

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Enable or disable logging

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      
     * @param enabled Whether to enable logging

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
     * @param max_entries Maximum entries to keep in memory

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
    void configure(bool enabled, size_t max_entries = 1000);

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Log a security event

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
     * @param event Event type

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
     * @param details Event details

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
    void log_event(const std::string& event, const std::string& details = "");

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Get recent log entries

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
     * @param count Number of entries to retrieve (0 = all)

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
     * @return Vector of audit entries

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
    std::vector<AuditEntry> get_entries(size_t count = 0) const;

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Clear all log entries

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    
                    
                      
    void clear();

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
    /**

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
     * @brief Check if logging is enabled

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
     */

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
    bool is_enabled() const;

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
private:

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
    AuditLogger();

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    1x
                    
                      
    ~AuditLogger() = default;

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
    AuditLogger(const AuditLogger&) = delete;

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
    AuditLogger& operator=(const AuditLogger&) = delete;

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
    mutable std::mutex mutex_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
    std::vector<AuditEntry> entries_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
    size_t max_entries_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
    bool enabled_;

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace security

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace autograder

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    
                    
                      
#endif // AUTOGRADER_SECURITY_H

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
// AUTOGRADER - TEST CASE VALIDATION MODULE (C++)

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
// File: test_validation.cpp

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
// Purpose: High-performance test case validation

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
// 

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
// STATUS: DEPRECATED - Moved to pure R implementation in R/validation.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
//         This file is kept for reference and potential future use.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
//         The R implementation is sufficient for list operations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
// Provides fast validation of test case structures with:

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
//   - Type checking

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
//   - Length consistency validation

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
//   - Default value generation

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
// Author: Reijel Agub (rcagub@up.edu.ph)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
// Version: 0.4.0

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
// License: MIT

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#include <Rcpp.h>

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#include <string>

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#include <vector>

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
using namespace Rcpp;

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
// VALIDATION RESULT STRUCTURE

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
struct TestValidationResult {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    bool valid;

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    std::string error_message;

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
    TestValidationResult() : valid(true) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    TestValidationResult(const std::string& err) : valid(false), error_message(err) {}

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
// VALIDATION FUNCTIONS (DEPRECATED - kept for reference)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
// NOTE: These functions are no longer exported to R.

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
// The pure R implementations in R/validation.R are used instead.

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
// List operations are R's native strength, so there's no performance benefit.

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
//' Validate test case structure (C++)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
//' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
//' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
//' Performs fast validation of test case structure with comprehensive

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
//' error checking. Returns validated and normalized test data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
//' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
//' @param test_data List containing test case configuration

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
//' @param function_name Name of function (for error messages)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
//' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
//' @return List with validated test_data and any error messages

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
//' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
// DEPRECATED: Now implemented in R - [[Rcpp::export(.cpp_validate_test_cases)]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
List cpp_validate_test_cases(List test_data, std::string function_name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    // Result structure

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string error_message = "";

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
    // ===== REQUIRED FIELD: inputs =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
    if (!test_data.containsElementNamed("inputs")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
        return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
            Named("valid") = false,

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
            Named("error") = "CRITICAL: Test cases for '" + function_name + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
                            "' are missing required 'inputs' field.\n" +

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
                            "Contact instructor to fix test configuration.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
            Named("data") = R_NilValue

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
        );

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
    SEXP inputs_sexp = test_data["inputs"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
    if (TYPEOF(inputs_sexp) != VECSXP || Rf_xlength(inputs_sexp) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
        return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
            Named("valid") = false,

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
            Named("error") = "CRITICAL: Test cases for '" + function_name + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
                            "' must have at least one test.\n" +

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
                            "Contact instructor to fix test configuration.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
            Named("data") = R_NilValue

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
        );

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
    List inputs(inputs_sexp);

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
    R_xlen_t n_tests = inputs.size();

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    // ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: descriptions =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    if (test_data.containsElementNamed("descriptions")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
        SEXP desc_sexp = test_data["descriptions"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
        if (TYPEOF(desc_sexp) == STRSXP) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
            if (Rf_xlength(desc_sexp) != n_tests) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
                return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("valid") = false,

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("error") = "CRITICAL: Test case descriptions length (" + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
                                    std::to_string(Rf_xlength(desc_sexp)) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
                                    ") doesn't match inputs length (" + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
                                    std::to_string(n_tests) + ").\n" +

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
                                    "Contact instructor to fix test configuration.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("data") = R_NilValue

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
                );

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
        // Generate default descriptions

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
        CharacterVector descriptions(n_tests);

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
        for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < n_tests; ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
            descriptions[i] = "Test " + std::to_string(i + 1);

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
        test_data["descriptions"] = descriptions;

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
    // ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: hidden =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
    if (test_data.containsElementNamed("hidden")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    !
                    
                      
        SEXP hidden_sexp = test_data["hidden"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    !
                    
                      
        if (TYPEOF(hidden_sexp) == LGLSXP) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
            if (Rf_xlength(hidden_sexp) != n_tests) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
                return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("valid") = false,

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("error") = "CRITICAL: 'hidden' field length (" + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
                                    std::to_string(Rf_xlength(hidden_sexp)) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
                                    ") doesn't match inputs length (" + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
                                    std::to_string(n_tests) + ").\nContact instructor.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("data") = R_NilValue

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
                );

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
            return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
                Named("valid") = false,

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
                Named("error") = "CRITICAL: 'hidden' field must be logical (TRUE/FALSE). Contact instructor.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
                Named("data") = R_NilValue

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
            );

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
        // Default: all tests visible

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
        LogicalVector hidden(n_tests, false);

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
        test_data["hidden"] = hidden;

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
    // ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: points =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    !
                    
                      
    if (test_data.containsElementNamed("points")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    !
                    
                      
        SEXP points_sexp = test_data["points"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    !
                    
                      
        if (TYPEOF(points_sexp) == REALSXP || TYPEOF(points_sexp) == INTSXP) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
            if (Rf_xlength(points_sexp) != n_tests) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
                return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("valid") = false,

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("error") = "CRITICAL: 'points' field length (" + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
                                    std::to_string(Rf_xlength(points_sexp)) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    !
                    
                      
                                    ") doesn't match inputs length (" + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
                                    std::to_string(n_tests) + ").\nContact instructor.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("data") = R_NilValue

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
                );

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
            

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
            // Check for negative values

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    !
                    
                      
            NumericVector points(points_sexp);

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    !
                    
                      
            for (R_xlen_t i = 0; i < points.size(); ++i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
                if (points[i] < 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
                    return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    !
                    
                      
                        Named("valid") = false,

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
                        Named("error") = "CRITICAL: 'points' must be non-negative numeric values. Contact instructor.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
                        Named("data") = R_NilValue

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
                    );

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
                }

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
