        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
            return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    !
                    
                      
                Named("valid") = false,

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    !
                    
                      
                Named("error") = "CRITICAL: 'points' must be numeric values. Contact instructor.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    !
                    
                      
                Named("data") = R_NilValue

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
            );

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
        // Default: all tests worth 1 point

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    !
                    
                      
        NumericVector points(n_tests, 1.0);

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    !
                    
                      
        test_data["points"] = points;

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
    // ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: tolerance =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    !
                    
                      
    if (test_data.containsElementNamed("tolerance")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    !
                    
                      
        SEXP tol_sexp = test_data["tolerance"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    !
                    
                      
        if (TYPEOF(tol_sexp) == REALSXP || TYPEOF(tol_sexp) == INTSXP) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    !
                    
                      
            if (Rf_xlength(tol_sexp) != 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
                return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("valid") = false,

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("error") = "CRITICAL: 'tolerance' must be a single numeric value. Contact instructor.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("data") = R_NilValue

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
                );

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    !
                    
                      
            double tol = Rcpp::as<double>(tol_sexp);

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    !
                    
                      
            if (tol < 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
                return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("valid") = false,

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("error") = "CRITICAL: 'tolerance' must be non-negative. Contact instructor.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    !
                    
                      
                    Named("data") = R_NilValue

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
                );

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
        // Default: 1e-10

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    !
                    
                      
        test_data["tolerance"] = 1e-10;

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
    // ===== OPTIONAL FIELD: hints =====

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    !
                    
                      
    if (test_data.containsElementNamed("hints")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    !
                    
                      
        SEXP hints_sexp = test_data["hints"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    !
                    
                      
        if (TYPEOF(hints_sexp) == STRSXP && Rf_xlength(hints_sexp) != n_tests) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
            // Length mismatch - remove hints with warning (handled in R)

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    !
                    
                      
            test_data["hints"] = R_NilValue;

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
    // Return validated data

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
    return List::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("valid") = true,

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("error") = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("data") = test_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
    );

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
//' Quick validation check for test case inputs

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
//' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
//' @param test_data List containing test case configuration

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
//' @return TRUE if basic structure is valid

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
//' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
// DEPRECATED: Now implemented in R - [[Rcpp::export(.cpp_quick_validate_inputs)]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    !
                    
                      
LogicalVector cpp_quick_validate_inputs(List test_data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
    // Check inputs exists and is non-empty list

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    !
                    
                      
    if (!test_data.containsElementNamed("inputs")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    !
                    
                      
        return LogicalVector::create(false);

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    !
                    
                      
    SEXP inputs_sexp = test_data["inputs"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    !
                    
                      
    if (TYPEOF(inputs_sexp) != VECSXP || Rf_xlength(inputs_sexp) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    !
                    
                      
        return LogicalVector::create(false);

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    !
                    
                      
    return LogicalVector::create(true);

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
//' Get test count from test data

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
//' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
//' @param test_data List containing test case configuration

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
//' @return Number of tests, or -1 if invalid

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
//' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
// DEPRECATED: Now implemented in R - [[Rcpp::export(.cpp_get_test_count)]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    !
                    
                      
IntegerVector cpp_get_test_count(List test_data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    !
                    
                      
    if (!test_data.containsElementNamed("inputs")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    !
                    
                      
        return IntegerVector::create(-1);

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    !
                    
                      
    SEXP inputs_sexp = test_data["inputs"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    !
                    
                      
    if (TYPEOF(inputs_sexp) != VECSXP) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    !
                    
                      
        return IntegerVector::create(-1);

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    !
                    
                      
    return IntegerVector::create(static_cast<int>(Rf_xlength(inputs_sexp)));

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
//' Validate field lengths match test count

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
//' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
//' @param test_data List containing test case configuration

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
//' @param n_tests Expected number of tests

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
//' @return LogicalVector with validation results for each field

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
//' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
// DEPRECATED: Now implemented in R - [[Rcpp::export(.cpp_validate_field_lengths)]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    !
                    
                      
LogicalVector cpp_validate_field_lengths(List test_data, int n_tests) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
    LogicalVector results = LogicalVector::create(

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("descriptions") = true,

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("hidden") = true,

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("points") = true,

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    !
                    
                      
        Named("hints") = true

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
    );

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
    // Check each field

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    !
                    
                      
    if (test_data.containsElementNamed("descriptions")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    !
                    
                      
        SEXP desc = test_data["descriptions"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    !
                    
                      
        results["descriptions"] = (Rf_xlength(desc) == n_tests);

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    !
                    
                      
    if (test_data.containsElementNamed("hidden")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    !
                    
                      
        SEXP hidden = test_data["hidden"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    !
                    
                      
        results["hidden"] = (Rf_xlength(hidden) == n_tests);

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    !
                    
                      
    if (test_data.containsElementNamed("points")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    !
                    
                      
        SEXP points = test_data["points"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    !
                    
                      
        results["points"] = (Rf_xlength(points) == n_tests);

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    !
                    
                      
    if (test_data.containsElementNamed("hints")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    !
                    
                      
        SEXP hints = test_data["hints"];

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    !
                    
                      
        results["hints"] = (Rf_xlength(hints) == n_tests);

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    !
                    
                      
    return results;

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
// AUTOGRADER - INPUT VALIDATION MODULE IMPLEMENTATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
// File: validation/validator.cpp

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
// Purpose: Implementation of input validation and sanitization

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
// Author: Reijel Agub (rcagub@up.edu.ph)

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
// Version: 0.4.0

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
// License: MIT

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
//

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#include "validator.h"

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#include <algorithm>

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#include <cctype>

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
namespace autograder {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
namespace validation {

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
// STATIC DATA

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
const std::vector<std::string> Validator::DANGEROUS_PATTERNS = {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    "..",           // Parent directory traversal

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    "./",           // Current directory

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    "//",           // Double slash

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    "\\",           // Windows path separator

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    "~",            // Home directory

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    "${",           // Variable expansion

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    "$((",          // Arithmetic expansion

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    "`",            // Command substitution

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    ";",            // Command separator

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    "|",            // Pipe

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    "&",            // Background/and

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
    ">",            // Redirect

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    "<",            // Redirect

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    "\n",           // Newline

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    "\r"            // Carriage return

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    // Note: null byte check must be done separately with strlen/contains_null

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
};

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
// VALIDATOR IMPLEMENTATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    236x
                    
                      
ValidationResult Validator::validate_function_name(const std::string& name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    // Empty name check

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    236x
                    
                      
    if (name.empty()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    5x
                    
                      
        return ValidationResult("Function name cannot be empty");

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    // Length check

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    231x
                    
                      
    if (name.length() > MAX_NAME_LENGTH) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    6x
                    
                      
        return ValidationResult("Function name too long (max " + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    12x
                    
                      
                               std::to_string(MAX_NAME_LENGTH) + " characters)");

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    // Null byte check (done separately since '\0' in std::string is tricky)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    225x
                    
                      
    if (name.find('\0') != std::string::npos) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
        return ValidationResult("Invalid function name: contains null byte");

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    // Path traversal check

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    225x
                    
                      
    if (contains_path_traversal(name)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    74x
                    
                      
        return ValidationResult("Invalid function name: contains unsafe characters");

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
    // Character whitelist check

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    941x
                    
                      
    for (char c : name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    804x
                    
                      
        if (!is_allowed_char(c)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    42x
                    
                      
            return ValidationResult("Invalid character '" + std::string(1, c) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
                                   "' in function name. Use only letters, numbers, "

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    14x
                    
                      
                                   "underscores, and hyphens.");

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
    // First character must be a letter or underscore

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    137x
                    
                      
    if (!std::isalpha(static_cast<unsigned char>(name[0])) && name[0] != '_') {

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    4x
                    
                      
        return ValidationResult("Function name must start with a letter or underscore");

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    133x
                    
                      
    return ValidationResult(true, name);

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    217x
                    
                      
bool Validator::is_valid_function_name(const std::string& name) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    217x
                    
                      
    return validate_function_name(name).valid;

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
ValidationResult Validator::validate_url(const std::string& url) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    if (url.empty()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
        return ValidationResult("URL cannot be empty");

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
    // Check for valid URL prefix

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
    if (url.substr(0, 7) != "http://" && url.substr(0, 8) != "https://") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
        return ValidationResult("URL must start with http:// or https://");

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
    // Check for dangerous patterns

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string lower_url = Sanitizer::to_lower(url);

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
    for (const auto& pattern : {"javascript:", "data:", "vbscript:", "file:"}) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
        if (lower_url.find(pattern) != std::string::npos) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
            return ValidationResult("URL contains unsafe protocol");

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
    return ValidationResult(true, url);

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
ValidationResult Validator::validate_path(const std::string& path) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
    if (path.empty()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
        return ValidationResult("Path cannot be empty");

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
    if (contains_path_traversal(path)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    !
                    
                      
        return ValidationResult("Path contains unsafe traversal patterns");

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
    // Sanitize the path

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string sanitized = sanitize_for_path(path);

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
    return ValidationResult(true, sanitized);

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
std::string Validator::sanitize_for_url(const std::string& input) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
    result.reserve(input.length());

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
    for (char c : input) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
        if (std::isalnum(static_cast<unsigned char>(c)) || 

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
            c == '-' || c == '_' || c == '.' || c == '~') {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
            result += c;

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
        } else if (c == ' ') {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
            result += "%20";

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
            // URL encode other characters

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
            char hex[4];

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
            snprintf(hex, sizeof(hex), "%%%02X", static_cast<unsigned char>(c));

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
            result += hex;

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    !
                    
                      
    return result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
std::string Validator::sanitize_for_path(const std::string& path) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    !
                    
                      
    result.reserve(path.length());

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    !
                    
                      
    for (char c : path) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
        if (std::isalnum(static_cast<unsigned char>(c)) || 

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
            c == '-' || c == '_' || c == '.' || c == '/') {

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    !
                    
                      
            result += c;

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
    // Remove any remaining path traversal

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    !
                    
                      
    while (result.find("..") != std::string::npos) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
        result = Sanitizer::replace_all(result, "..", "");

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
    return result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    225x
                    
                      
bool Validator::contains_path_traversal(const std::string& path) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    2991x
                    
                      
    for (const auto& pattern : DANGEROUS_PATTERNS) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    2840x
                    
                      
        if (path.find(pattern) != std::string::npos) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    74x
                    
                      
            return true;

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    151x
                    
                      
    return false;

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    804x
                    
                      
bool Validator::is_allowed_char(char c) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    40x
                    
                      
    return std::isalnum(static_cast<unsigned char>(c)) || 

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    844x
                    
                      
           c == '_' || 

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    804x
                    
                      
           c == '-';

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    !
                    
                      
ValidationResult Validator::validate_test_cases(const std::string& test_data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
    // Placeholder for test case validation

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
    // In actual implementation, this would validate R test case structure

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    !
                    
                      
    if (test_data.empty()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    !
                    
                      
        return ValidationResult("Test data cannot be empty");

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    !
                    
                      
    return ValidationResult(true, test_data);

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
// SANITIZER IMPLEMENTATION

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
// ============================================================================

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    !
                    
                      
std::string Sanitizer::remove_special_chars(const std::string& input, 

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
                                            const std::string& allowed) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    !
                    
                      
    result.reserve(input.length());

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    !
                    
                      
    for (char c : input) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    !
                    
                      
        if (std::isalnum(static_cast<unsigned char>(c)) || 

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    !
                    
                      
            allowed.find(c) != std::string::npos) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    !
                    
                      
            result += c;

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    !
                    
                      
    return result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    !
                    
                      
std::string Sanitizer::escape_shell(const std::string& input) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    !
                    
                      
    result.reserve(input.length() * 2);

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    !
                    
                      
    for (char c : input) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    !
                    
                      
        switch (c) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    !
                    
                      
            case '\'':

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    !
                    
                      
                result += "'\\''";

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    !
                    
                      
                break;

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    !
                    
                      
            case '\\':

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
            case '"':

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
            case '$':

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
            case '`':

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
            case '!':

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    !
                    
                      
                result += '\\';

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    !
                    
                      
                result += c;

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    !
                    
                      
                break;

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    !
                    
                      
            default:

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    !
                    
                      
                result += c;

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    !
                    
                      
    return result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    !
                    
                      
std::string Sanitizer::trim(const std::string& input) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    !
                    
                      
    size_t start = input.find_first_not_of(" \t\n\r\f\v");

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    !
                    
                      
    if (start == std::string::npos) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    !
                    
                      
        return "";

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    !
                    
                      
    size_t end = input.find_last_not_of(" \t\n\r\f\v");

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    !
                    
                      
    return input.substr(start, end - start + 1);

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    !
                    
                      
std::string Sanitizer::to_lower(const std::string& input) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string result = input;

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    !
                    
                      
    std::transform(result.begin(), result.end(), result.begin(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    !
                    
                      
                   [](unsigned char c) { return std::tolower(c); });

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    !
                    
                      
    return result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    !
                    
                      
std::string Sanitizer::to_upper(const std::string& input) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string result = input;

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    !
                    
                      
    std::transform(result.begin(), result.end(), result.begin(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    !
                    
                      
                   [](unsigned char c) { return std::toupper(c); });

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    !
                    
                      
    return result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    !
                    
                      
std::string Sanitizer::replace_all(const std::string& input,

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
                                   const std::string& from,

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
                                   const std::string& to) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    !
                    
                      
    if (from.empty()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    !
                    
                      
        return input;

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    !
                    
                      
    std::string result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    !
                    
                      
    size_t start = 0;

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
    size_t pos;

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    !
                    
                      
    while ((pos = input.find(from, start)) != std::string::npos) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    !
                    
                      
        result += input.substr(start, pos - start);

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    !
                    
                      
        result += to;

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    !
                    
                      
        start = pos + from.length();

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
    

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    !
                    
                      
    result += input.substr(start);

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    !
                    
                      
    return result;

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace validation

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
} // namespace autograder
